Ai
Ai is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	To win all the way, of course.
Ai is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
Ai seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
Ai is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
Ai is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	Cool! Keep it up!
Ai is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	It's silly of you to worry about such things. Are you feeling okay?
Ai is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	The door's over there.
Ai is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	It can't be perfect every time.
Ai is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and Ai is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.
You forgot to lock Ai and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's your fault.
Ai is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Nicely done! We're throwing a party today!
Ai is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Ai for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.
Ai is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
Ai seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.
On a day off, Ai is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
Ai is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

Ai is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Ai is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Ai wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Ai is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Ai is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Ai is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Ai says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Ai seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Ai in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Ai is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Ai says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Ai says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Ai picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Ai is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Ai thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Aiolos
Aiolos is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Aiolos is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Aiolos wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Aiolos is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Aiolos is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Aiolos is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Aiolos says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Aiolos seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Aiolos in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Aiolos is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Aiolos says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Aiolos says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Aiolos picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Aiolos is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Aiolos thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

You find Aiolos depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Aiolos is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Aiolos being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Aiolos is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Aiolos is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Aiolos is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Aiolos seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Aiolos who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Aiolos and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Aiolos looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Aiolos's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Aiolos seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Aiolos.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Aiolos and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Aiolos do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Aiolos. What should you say?
	Well, Aiolos does have that kind of charm.
Aiolos is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Aiolos after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

You come across Aiolos, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.
Aiolos is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.
Aiolos, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	Just playing soccer, that's all.
Aiolos says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.
You're having a conversation with Aiolos about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I need a Spirit Stone that's as fancy as I am.
Aiolos is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!
Let's talk to Aiolos who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	I hope it's not a boring place.
Aiolos is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	Let's not talk about anything irrelevant to the match.
The teammates are speaking highly of Aiolos, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She shows dominance with elegance.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I'm considering making an anonymous donation.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Aiolos wants to say a word.
	Get yourselves together, guys. Are you going to give up already?
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	It's sort of an obligation for first class athletes like me to mingle with the community.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Aiolos points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Aiolos seems to be surprised.
	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Aiolos is asking for help.
	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.
Cracsus threatens to hack Aiolos's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	I contacted Hildegard.
Aiolos is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Aiolos is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

Akane
Akane is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	Best of 4 should be our goal.
Akane is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I think that being able to understand each other is the most important.
Akane seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	It's within our grasp.
Akane is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	The honor of our opponent is also important.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	Be true to yourself.
Akane is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I'm sure you're going to become an intergalactic fool.
Akane is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	We must have faith in the Gate Keepers and win the Galaxy League.
Akane is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Are you giving up before putting up a fight?
Akane is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	This needs to be analyzed and fixed. Can you help me?
Akane is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	No, it's not boring.
It's before the 2nd half, and Akane is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	Don't give up until the end.
You forgot to lock Akane and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's my fault.
Akane is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	You deserve it. Well done!
Akane is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	I would've been doing something to save the universe.
The team is saying bad things about Akane for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Do you really think that she would skip practice?
Akane is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Akane seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	Let's go look for her.
On a day off, Akane is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	I'd love to have a stable job first.
Akane is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I just don't want to waste a single day in my life.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	Let's split up and find the uniforms.

Akane seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	They say the fortune-telling is inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
With a serious face, Akane is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	A way that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Akane came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Just please go with that boring strategy.
Akane is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Akane is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Akane seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Akane seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Akane is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Akane is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Akane plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Akane and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Akane seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Akane's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Akane bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Akane is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Akane is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Akane is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

Alice
Alice says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Alice asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Alice is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Alice looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Alice says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Alice wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Alice is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Alice says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Alice says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Alice seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Alice is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Alice says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Alice seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Alice is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Alice went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of her when she comes back.
Alice claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Alice seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Alice says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Alice hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Alice says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Alice seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	Game results aren't that simple to be predicted by fortune-telling.
With a serious face, Alice is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	Being together is enough for me.
Alice came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	I'm disappointed, too. Let's start over.
Alice is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	Even if they're not on the field with us, we're fighting as one. Right?
The team is having a good run and Alice is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	Let's keep this momentum going!
Alice seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Alice seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Don't be weak.
Alice is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Alice is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Alice plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Alice and talk about what to do.
	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
Alice seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great. 
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	...Uh...So no soccer?
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Alice's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Remember that feeling and use it when things get tough.
During a match, Alice bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	It's something that happened during the match. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Alice is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.
Alice is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Alice is starting to get intimidated.
	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

	Alicia? Nah, she never gets lost.

	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.

	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.

	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.

	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.

	Let's try out some forward passes.

You come across Angela being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Angela is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Angela is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Angela is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Angela seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Angela who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Angela and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Angela looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Angela's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Angela seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Angela.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Angela and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Angela do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Angela. What should you say?
	Well, Angela does have that kind of charm.
Angela is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Angela after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Angela seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	They say the fortune-telling is inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
With a serious face, Angela is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	A way that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Angela came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Just please go with that boring strategy.
Angela is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Angela is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Angela seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Angela seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Angela is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Angela is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Angela plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Angela and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Angela seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Angela's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Angela bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Angela is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Angela is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Angela is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

Anis
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Anis asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Anis suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Anis is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Pat her on the head.)
Anis has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Anis said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Anis. Anis seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Anis is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I am so thankful to them.
Anis was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Anis asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Anis falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Anis up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.

	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Anis is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Anis scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Anis.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Anis falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Anis lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?

	They must love volunteer work!

Ari
Ari is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's a result of team effort.

	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.

	Bathroom...It is indeed a very important matter...

	I can't pick just one...

	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.

	We can overcome this with team effort.

	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.

	They support us from the shadows.

Ari (Swimsuit)

	That doesn't change what we must do.
Asakura wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Asakura is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Asakura? Nah, she never gets lost.
You find Asakura lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Asakura says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Asakura wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Asakura caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Asakura some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Asakura seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Asakura came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Asakura is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Asakura seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Asakura looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Asakura to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

You come across Asakura, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.
Asakura is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.
Asakura, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	Just playing soccer, that's all.
Asakura says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.
You're having a conversation with Asakura about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I need a Spirit Stone that's as fancy as I am.
Asakura is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!
Let's talk to Asakura who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	I hope it's not a boring place.
Asakura is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	Let's not talk about anything irrelevant to the match.
The teammates are speaking highly of Asakura, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She shows dominance with elegance.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I'm considering making an anonymous donation.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Asakura wants to say a word.
	Get yourselves together, guys. Are you going to give up already?
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	It's sort of an obligation for first class athletes like me to mingle with the community.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Asakura points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Asakura seems to be surprised.
	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Asakura is asking for help.
	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.
Cracsus threatens to hack Asakura's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	I contacted Hildegard.
Asakura is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Asakura is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

Askeladd
Askeladd is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's a result of team effort.
After a meeting, Askeladd's eyes met yours a several times and Askeladd asks if she has something on her face.
	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.
With a serious look on her face, Askeladd warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	Bathroom...It is indeed a very important matter...
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Askeladd on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	I can't pick just one...
Askeladd is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
	Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Askeladd is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
	I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
Askeladd is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
	Every teammate there by my side on the field is special.
You find Askeladd being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Now we're starting to look like a team!
Askeladd is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
	I'll teach you how to meditate to synchronize the breathing with other teammates.
Askeladd is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
Askeladd doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
It's Askeladd's birthday. Let's give her a present.
	Here! I made some cookies with the team.
You see Askeladd's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Askeladd. What should we do?
	Let's see how long they last. Come on guys!
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Askeladd's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to her?
	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?
Askeladd comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	There will always be a place for you to return.
Askeladd is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Askeladd.
	We can overcome this with team effort.
Askeladd is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Askeladd seems to be interested.
	We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
Askeladd says she wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots she makes.
	I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.

Askeladd is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	They were a worthy opponent.
This was the worst game in your entire life...Askeladd comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks. You always know how to get me back on my feet.
You're talking to Askeladd about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
	I would say goodbye to all my friends.
Askeladd is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
	I'm sure everybody is feeling the same way you feel.
Askeladd is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
	Let's make that our goal and make it happen.
Askeladd isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	Let's all talk together and figure out what the problem is.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Askeladd for solutions.
	I guess it's time the benchwarmers get a chance.
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	Let's ask for help to the League officials on this planet.
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Askeladd and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	Let's give her some space.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	This proves that even the aliens like Nari.
According to Askeladd's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	I thought they were just friends.
Askeladd thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	First, let's look for a way to bring him back to normal. 
Askeladd won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	Hmm, come back to me with a vacation plan.
Askeladd suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	That would be wonderful! I'll go ask for permission.
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Let's see what you have to say after the match.
You're sick and in bed when Askeladd and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	I'm sorry...I should be giving you guys some tea or something, but...

	I'm sorry that you couldn't go.

	Long ago, he was disgraceful towards a dragon emissary.

	Excuse me, but do you have an appointment with that cat?

	Looks like we'll have to do without her.

	They support us from the shadows.

	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.

	Flawless skills.

	We'll see about it after the League.

	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!

	I guess he's happy this is a good match.

	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.

	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.

	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

	Vicious? More like ugly.

	Passes that you prefer aren't always the right answer.

	If you're up for suggestions, I'm all ears.

	We should at least put up a fight so they remember us.
You forgot to lock Azrael and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It was all just to motivate you to become a better player!
Azrael is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Aren't you satisfied with your performance?

	I would've tried to find something that fits me.
The team is saying bad things about Azrael for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Skipping practice isn't something that's in her dictionary.

	Hmm...If only I could change the shape of the horns and the color of the scales. That'd be perfect.

	Everybody should grow up.

	It's really hard to find the right person.

	(I want my dreams to come true.)

	What's done is done. Let's come up with a new design.

	You were picking the other team apart! It was awesome!

	I like puppies. The loyal ones!

	I feel something when I overpower my opponents on the field.

	*Smiles bitterly*

	Rugby, a sport of strength!

	...That's not a rabbit.

	Let's make him put on Ogre's underwear.

	(Guide her by kicking the ball toward the weak link in the opponent's defense.)

	(Ignore it.)

	(Eat it instead of her.)

	Wake them up. Kick them if you need to.

	We shouldn't throw away food. Let's give it to somebody else.

	(Let her steal your umbrella.)

	(Tell Azrael who did this.)

	Okay. You make them pay, understand?

	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Blue Dragon points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Blue Dragon seems to be surprised.
	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Blue Dragon is asking for help.
	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.
Cracsus threatens to hack Blue Dragon's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	I contacted Hildegard.
Blue Dragon is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Blue Dragon is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

Blue King
Blue King is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Blue King, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Blue King announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Blue King is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Blue King wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Blue King is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Blue King? Nah, he never gets lost.
You find Blue King lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Blue King says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Blue King wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Blue King caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Blue King some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Blue King seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Blue King came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Blue King is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Blue King seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Blue King looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Blue King to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

You come across Blue King, who was overwhelmed by his opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer him up.
	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.
Blue King is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.
Blue King, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal what your agenda really is. What should we say?
	Just playing soccer, that's all.
Blue King says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give him an answer.
	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.
You're having a conversation with Blue King about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell him what you think.
	I need a Spirit Stone that's as fancy as I am.
Blue King is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!
Let's talk to Blue King who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	I hope it's not a boring place.
Blue King is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell him your thoughts.
	Let's not talk about anything irrelevant to the match.
The teammates are speaking highly of Blue King, saying he's a good role model. Let's add in.
	He shows dominance with elegance.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I'm considering making an anonymous donation.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Blue King wants to say a word.
	Get yourselves together, guys. Are you going to give up already?
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	It's sort of an obligation for first class athletes like me to mingle with the community.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Blue King points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Blue King seems to be surprised.
	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Blue King is asking for help.
	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.
Cracsus threatens to hack Blue King's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	I contacted Hildegard.
Blue King is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Blue King is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

Bora
Bora is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.

	I've never dreamt about soccer.

	I have faith in you.

	That doesn't change what we must do.

	Bora? Nah, she never gets lost.

	It's space. Anything can exist here.

	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Bora seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	Game results aren't that simple to be predicted by fortune-telling.
With a serious face, Bora is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	Being together is enough for me.
Bora came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	I'm disappointed, too. Let's start over.
Bora is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	Even if they're not on the field with us, we're fighting as one. Right?
The team is having a good run and Bora is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	Let's keep this momentum going!
Bora seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Bora seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Don't be weak.
Bora is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Bora is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Bora plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Bora and talk about what to do.
	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
Bora seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great. 
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	...Uh...So no soccer?
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Bora's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Remember that feeling and use it when things get tough.
During a match, Bora bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	It's something that happened during the match. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Bora is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.
Bora is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Bora is starting to get intimidated.
	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

Brett
Brett is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell him?
	Best of 4 should be our goal.
Brett is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I think that being able to understand each other is the most important.
Brett seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. He seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	It's within our grasp.
Brett is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop him from causing any problems.
	The honor of our opponent is also important.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
	Be true to yourself.
Brett is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I'm sure you're going to become an intergalactic fool.
Brett is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
	We must have faith in the Gate Keepers and win the Galaxy League.
Brett is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Are you giving up before putting up a fight?
Brett is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	This needs to be analyzed and fixed. Can you help me?
Brett is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
	No, it's not boring.
It's before the 2nd half, and Brett is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	Don't give up until the end.
You forgot to lock Brett and almost used him as training material! He looks very upset!
	It's my fault.
Brett is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
	You deserve it. Well done!
Brett is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	I would've been doing something to save the universe.
The team is saying bad things about Brett for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Do you really think that he would skip practice?
Brett is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Brett seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him. 
	Let's go look for him.
On a day off, Brett is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	I'd love to have a stable job first.
Brett is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I just don't want to waste a single day in my life.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	Let's split up and find the uniforms.

The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Brett asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Brett suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Brett is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Brett has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Brett said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Brett. Brett seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Brett is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Brett was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Brett asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Brett falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Brett up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Brett having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Brett is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	The fans love your performance!
Brett scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Brett.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Brett falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Brett lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Brett. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Brett is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Brett brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Butcher
Butcher is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's a result of team effort.
After a meeting, Butcher's eyes met yours a several times and Butcher asks if he has something on his face.
	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.
With a serious look on his face, Butcher warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	Bathroom...It is indeed a very important matter...
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Butcher on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	I can't pick just one...
Butcher is worried that he has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell him?
	Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Butcher is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to him.
	I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
Butcher is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give him an answer.
	Every teammate there by my side on the field is special.
You find Butcher being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Now we're starting to look like a team!
Butcher is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help him out.
	I'll teach you how to meditate to synchronize the breathing with other teammates.
Butcher is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
Butcher doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
It's Butcher's birthday. Let's give him a present.
	Here! I made some cookies with the team.
You see Butcher's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Butcher. What should we do?
	Let's see how long they last. Come on guys!
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Butcher's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to him?
	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?
Butcher comes to you and says that he has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	There will always be a place for you to return.
Butcher is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Butcher.
	We can overcome this with team effort.
Butcher is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Butcher seems to be interested.
	We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
Butcher says he wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots he makes.
	I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.

You find Butcher depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Butcher is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Butcher being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?
Butcher is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Butcher is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Butcher is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Butcher seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Butcher who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Butcher and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Butcher looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Butcher's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Butcher seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Butcher.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Butcher and his opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Butcher do?
	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Butcher. What should you say?
	Well, Butcher does have that kind of charm.
Butcher is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Butcher after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

	It's within our grasp.

	The honor of our opponent is also important.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
	Be true to yourself.
Cassiel is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I'm sure you're going to become an intergalactic fool.
Cassiel is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
	We must have faith in the Gate Keepers and win the Galaxy League.
Cassiel is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Are you giving up before putting up a fight?
Cassiel is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	This needs to be analyzed and fixed. Can you help me?
Cassiel is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
	No, it's not boring.
It's before the 2nd half, and Cassiel is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	Don't give up until the end.
You forgot to lock Cassiel and almost used him as training material! He looks very upset!
	It's my fault.
Cassiel is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
	You deserve it. Well done!
Cassiel is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	I would've been doing something to save the universe.
The team is saying bad things about Cassiel for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Do you really think that he would skip practice?
Cassiel is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Cassiel seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him. 
	Let's go look for him.
On a day off, Cassiel is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	I'd love to have a stable job first.
Cassiel is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I just don't want to waste a single day in my life.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	Let's split up and find the uniforms.

You come across Cassiel, who was overwhelmed by his opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer him up.
	Those scumbags played dirty. Ugh, I'm angry!
Cassiel is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	I'm not comfortable with this conversation.

	To bring justice with soccer. That's all.
Cassiel says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give him an answer.
	Let's do our best until the very end!

	I won't rely on Spirit Stones.

	I like what you just said.

	It's a place to rest for the good.

	It's something I'd want to see again with a person I care.

	He's truly a role model to us all with his skills and attitude.

	I feel sorry, but that's irrelevant to the match.

	We will confront them fair and square, and win.

	I hope the demon didn't say anything stupid.

	Then we should do our very best to win.

	I don't like the word oblivion.

	The fans love your performance!

	I feel like he's mocking us!

Cecily

	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.

	That must hurt.

	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?
