Ciel is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Ciel says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Ciel says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Ciel seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Ciel is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Ciel says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Ciel seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Ciel is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Ciel went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of her when she comes back.
Ciel claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Ciel seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Ciel says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Ciel hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Ciel says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Clarisa
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Clarisa asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Clarisa suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Clarisa is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Pat her on the head.)
Clarisa has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Clarisa said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Clarisa. Clarisa seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Clarisa is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I am so thankful to them.
Clarisa was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Clarisa asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Clarisa falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Clarisa up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Clarisa having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Clarisa is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Clarisa scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Clarisa.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Clarisa falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Clarisa lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give her some heals?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Clarisa. Let's talk to her.
	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Clarisa is curious and wants to take a look.
	They must love volunteer work!
Clarisa brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

Clarisa is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Clarisa is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Clarisa wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Clarisa is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Clarisa is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Clarisa is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Clarisa says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Clarisa seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Clarisa in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Clarisa is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Clarisa says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Clarisa says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Clarisa picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Clarisa is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Clarisa thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Constance
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Constance asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Constance suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Constance is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Constance has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Constance said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Constance. Constance seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Constance is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Constance was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Constance asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Constance falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Constance up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Constance having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Constance is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	The fans love your performance!
Constance scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Constance.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Constance falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Constance lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Constance. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Constance is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Constance brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Constance is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	The other team went home crying!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Constance comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
You're talking to Constance about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.
Constance is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
	It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
Constance is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
	Make the scouters fall in love with your performance!
Constance isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Constance for solutions.
	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this. 
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Constance and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	There's no time for tears! Find out who did this and bring justice!
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
According to Constance's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	William doesn't know how to respect his seniors.
Constance thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	...Sometimes, the truth is better to be left a secret.
Constance won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	What about soccer? You'll have to go through me to go on that trip!
Constance suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Care to receive the ball with your face?
You're sick and in bed when Constance and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	You guys...I'm about to cry...
The match and the concert that Constance was looking for start at the same time...
	Channel that sorrow and rage towards your opponents and make them pay.
Constance wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Stop right there!
The match started and Constance is standing still doing nothing.
	Run! Just start running!

	Littre will be fine.

	That player is just messing with you.

	Let's give them a hand.

	You better win that fight!

	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)

	Can you peel this guy off of me?

	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Crocell
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Crocell asks how you feel. How should we answer?

	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?

	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.

	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!

	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.

	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Crocell lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?

	(Ignore.)

	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.

	Throw it away. NOW.

	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.

	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.

	Just playing soccer, that's all.

	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.

	I need a Spirit Stone that's as fancy as I am.
Crocell is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!

	I hope it's not a boring place.

	Let's not talk about anything irrelevant to the match.

	He shows dominance with elegance.

	I'm considering making an anonymous donation.

	Get yourselves together, guys. Are you going to give up already?

	It's sort of an obligation for first class athletes like me to mingle with the community.

	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.

	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Crocell points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.

	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.

	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.

	I contacted Hildegard.

	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Crocell is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Crovia and talk about what to do.
	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
Crovia seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great. 
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	...Uh...So no soccer?
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Crovia's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Remember that feeling and use it when things get tough.
During a match, Crovia bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	It's something that happened during the match. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Crovia is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.
Crovia is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Crovia is starting to get intimidated.
	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

Cynthia
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Cynthia asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	What, are you expecting something like ''I feel like I can fly'' or something?
Cynthia suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How could you think about eating at a time like this? I'm disappointed in you.
Cynthia is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Just nod your head.)
Cynthia has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.

	How about just accepting the compliments for today?

	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.

	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!

	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Cynthia falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Cynthia up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?

	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Cynthia having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Cynthia is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Cynthia scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Cynthia.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Cynthia falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Cynthia lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...

	(Ignore.)

	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.

	Throw it away. NOW.

	You. I know you're doing much for the team without taking any credit.

	I want to practice with you, if that's okay with you. No?

	Yeah? Well, I did what I did for you.

	(Maybe she brought snacks but is too shy to share it with me.)

	Nervous? Trust me. I got you.

	Huh? I think Cynthia is prettier.

	You're young and good looking even without that.

	That's the spirit! Let's teach them a lesson!

	Try starting off with some small talk.

	Your spirit is an inspiration to us all.

	Let's go visit her. Some fun won't do any harm. It might even cheer her up!

	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Death Queen thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Didi

	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.

	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Duran falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Duran up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Duran having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Duran is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Duran scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Duran.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Duran falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Duran lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Duran. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Duran is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Duran brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

You come across Duran, who was overwhelmed by his opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer him up.
	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.
Duran is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.
Duran, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal what your agenda really is. What should we say?
	Just playing soccer, that's all.
Duran says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give him an answer.
	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.
You're having a conversation with Duran about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell him what you think.
	I need a Spirit Stone that's as fancy as I am.
Duran is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!
Let's talk to Duran who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	I hope it's not a boring place.
Duran is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell him your thoughts.
	Let's not talk about anything irrelevant to the match.
The teammates are speaking highly of Duran, saying he's a good role model. Let's add in.
	He shows dominance with elegance.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I'm considering making an anonymous donation.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Duran wants to say a word.
	Get yourselves together, guys. Are you going to give up already?
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	It's sort of an obligation for first class athletes like me to mingle with the community.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Duran points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Duran seems to be surprised.
	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Duran is asking for help.
	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.
Cracsus threatens to hack Duran's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	I contacted Hildegard.
Duran is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Duran is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

Dynames
Dynames is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
	What could it be? Money? Luck? Weather? Hmm? What?
Dynames, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've been chased by a soccer ball monster in my dreams. It was terrifying.
Dynames announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	You'll have to compete with me!
Dynames is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.
Dynames wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	It'll be pretty exciting if we could stay the same even after 10 years.
It seems that Dynames is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Listen carefully and you'll find him.
You find Dynames lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Stop wandering around the kids snack corner!
Dynames says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Hmm? That is odd...What do you think about this?
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	I'll tackle him down! Knock his lights out!
Dynames wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	What about just watching?
Dynames caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	You came to see my marvelous moves? I'm flattered. 
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Dynames some orders.
	Pass? Shoot? Forfeit? Argh! Just make a run for it!
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	Stop right there, pig!
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Dynames seems to be worried.
	Let's just go. That player will also feel uncomfortable if we keep standing here.
Dynames came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	What happened to you? Do you want me to lend you some money?
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...It's about to go down...! Where's the popcorn?

	Who could've done such a hideous thing?

	Okay! Now I'll tell you all the good stuff about Dynames!
Dynames looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	How about we ask Jeunese?
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Dynames to set some simple rules.
	Come on, I'll show you the best spots around!

	Well, you're looking at the one person that is making this team great.

	I'm sure the lesson here is that all of us need to learn.

	Stop being embarrassed and just accept the compliments, will you?

	(There must be a reason why he started this conversation.)

	Isn't it awesome to see the galaxy come together for soccer?

	It's all good as long as it doesn't affect the match.
Dynames is talking about how famous his rivals are in the Galaxy League. He seems jealous. Let's talk to him.
	Good rivalry brings both sides to higher levels.
Dynames is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
	He's good looking and has a good personality. Maybe that's why.

	He's like the wind. There wasn't even time to chat.

	I like how even the minority can be saved in this society.

	Looks like Ogre is goofing around. I mean the guy has like over 200 pounds over Kuma.

	Congratulations!

	Political power means nothing on the field.

	That's not like you...

	Looks aren't important when it comes to soccer.
Dynames seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give him some advice.
	I like how you're doing your best.

	It's not your fault. Let's try to find out why this is happening.

	You're a good person.

	Let's be prepared to take care of her in case her sickness gets worse.

It's a very intense match and Elicia falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Elicia up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Elicia having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Elicia is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Elicia scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Elicia.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Elicia falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Elicia lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Elicia. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Elicia is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Elicia brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

Elicia is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give her an answer.
	You. I know you're doing much for the team without taking any credit.
Elicia is angry because she was criticized by her performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give her an answer.
	I want to practice with you, if that's okay with you. No?
Elicia, who has shown absolutely superb chemistry with you, is embarrassed and says she didn't do all of that because of you. What should we say?
	Yeah? Well, I did what I did for you.
Elicia wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?
	(Maybe she brought snacks but is too shy to share it with me.)
Elicia looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
	Nervous? Trust me. I got you.
Elicia seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to her.
	Should we join the club?
Elicia is talking about how famous her rivals are in the Galaxy League. She seems jealous. Let's talk to her.
	I'll be your rival from now.
Elicia is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
	Are you jealous?
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Elicia on the head while teasing her, and then goes away. Elicia seems angry...
	...I think you liked it more than you thought...
The team is at Metro City. Elicia seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
	You have a heart of gold.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Elicia seems confused.
	Two bears...Which one is Kuma?
Elicia is spreading the happy news about her cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate her.
	So, the numerous baby clothes you've been making were all for this day?
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
	Huh? I think Elicia is prettier.
Elicia refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to her.
	Are you angry because I wasn't there to oversee your training? I said I'm sorry!
Elicia is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?
	Be honest and show a sincere attitude.
Elicia seems to be interested in the Micrinum from Kiri, which is said to be good for beauty and anti-aging. Let's talk to her.
	You're young and good looking even without that.
Elicia seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give her some advice.
	That's the spirit! Let's teach them a lesson!
Elicia looks sad because she feels her friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to her?
	Try starting off with some small talk.
It's a tough match, but Elicia is standing tall and encouraging the team. What should we say to her?
	Your spirit is an inspiration to us all.
A teammate that is a former member of the Dark Sisters is down sick, suffering from the aftermath of performing exorcism. Let's talk with Elicia about what to do.
	Let's go visit her. Some fun won't do any harm. It might even cheer her up!

Elise
Elise is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Elise is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Elise wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Elise is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Elise is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Elise is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Elise says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Elise seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Elise in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Elise is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Elise says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Elise says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Elise picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Elise is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Elise thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Elise seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	They say the fortune-telling is inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
With a serious face, Elise is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	A way that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Elise came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Just please go with that boring strategy.
Elise is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Elise is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Elise seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Elise seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Elise is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Elise is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Elise plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Elise and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Elise seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Elise's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Elise bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Elise is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Elise is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Elise is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

Elua

Enthia
Enthia is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	Best of 4 should be our goal.

	I think that being able to understand each other is the most important.

	It's within our grasp.

	The honor of our opponent is also important.

	Be true to yourself.

Enthia is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	We must have faith in the Gate Keepers and win the Galaxy League.

	Are you giving up before putting up a fight?

	This needs to be analyzed and fixed. Can you help me?

	No, it's not boring.
It's before the 2nd half, and Enthia is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	Don't give up until the end.

	It's my fault.

	You deserve it. Well done!

	I would've been doing something to save the universe.
The team is saying bad things about Enthia for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Do you really think that she would skip practice?
Enthia is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Enthia seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	Let's go look for her.
On a day off, Enthia is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	I'd love to have a stable job first.
Enthia is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I just don't want to waste a single day in my life.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	Let's split up and find the uniforms.

Enthia says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Of course! Everybody is counting on you!
Enthia asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I want to see everybody smile. I think that'll make me happy.

	I'd like to keep one as a pet.

	Where do you think those comets are going?

	Yeah, I mean they could get hurt.

	Life is a light of its own.

	Just hear them out and smile. They'll feel better.

	I sense that there's something she hasn't told us yet...
Enthia seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Congratulations! How did you guys get along?

	You're playing soccer! You're fine!

	Tell her to be our lap cat.

	If you guys keep giving Enthia trouble, I swear to god I'll use you both as special training material.

	She seems like a nice girl.

	Enthia is in danger! We have to save her!

	She must've made a mistake.

	We can do this! Let's go!

	Yeah, they get along pretty well.

	(A cute and pretty pendant)

	I think she likes him.

Ere Ere

	Be careful not to be stomped on...

	(A chocker with a pretty radical design.)

	That's a mixture of mockery, sympathy, and love.

	Hmm? That is odd...What do you think about this?

	What about just watching?

	Pass? Shoot? Forfeit? Argh! Just make a run for it!

	Stop right there, pig!

	Come on, I'll show you the best spots around!

Erica

	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Evylin asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Evylin falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Evylin up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Evylin having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Evylin is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Evylin scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Evylin.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.

	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Evylin lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give her some heals?

	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.

	They must love volunteer work!

	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

Freyja is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Freyja seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Freyja looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Freyja to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Freyja is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	The opponents are mesmerized by the beauty of our players.
After a meeting, Freyja's eyes met yours a several times and Freyja asks if she has something on her face.
	Yeah, Kuma's hat...
With a serious look on her face, Freyja warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	Why does an ordinary advice sound so strange...
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Freyja on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	I think it should be you, but will you be able to return to your normal life after all of this is...Wait, I'm going off topic, right?
Freyja is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
	Look at the beautiful players! This is paradise!
Freyja is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
	...If you want to say something, it's alright. I'll be listening.
Freyja is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
	My Nari dakimakura! She's the best idol in the universe and is super strong.
You find Freyja being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Can't you do that more often?! (Cries)
Freyja is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
	It's impossible to focus on a field with so many handsome men.
Freyja is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	That bear...Is a hero...!
Freyja doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	There's not enough fan service.
It's Freyja's birthday. Let's give her a present.
	I stole this treasure box from Kuma.
You see Freyja's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Freyja. What should we do?
	Tell me if you like her. Just say the words and I'll scout her.
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	Manga, anime, and figures...! Here I come!
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Freyja's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to her?
	This is our chance to steal his precious collection.
Freyja comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	So, how does this work? Do I tap ''Sell''?
Freyja is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Freyja.
	I think we should come up with an action speed deck or go for counterattacks...
Freyja is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	So, is that king entering the Galaxy League?
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Freyja seems to be interested.
	I'll give you this, so get rid of that fake ticket.
Freyja says she wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots she makes.
	Let's start by picking their defenses apart.

Furion
Furion is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's all thanks to you.
After a meeting, Furion's eyes met yours a several times and Furion asks if he has something on his face.
	I was just thinking the team became stronger, thanks to you.
With a serious look on his face, Furion warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	I'm surprised you said that. I won't ask what happened to you.
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Furion on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	You and I are already perfect. So I guess that means we shouldn't be saying our names.
Furion is worried that he has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell him?
	You're the most dangerous of them all.
Furion is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to him.
	Let's go tell the manager.
Furion is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give him an answer.
	I think that may be you.
You find Furion being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Nice play! Fantastic!
Furion is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help him out.
	Just calm down a bit. You got this.
Furion is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	He's just material for leveling up.
Furion doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't portray your awesome performance.
It's Furion's birthday. Let's give him a present.
	This is a championship trophy replica for you. The designs are inspired by you.
You see Furion's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Furion. What should we do?
	He is probably not even listening...
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	It's time for some good food.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Furion's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to him?
	This won't be the end of your rival. 
Furion comes to you and says that he has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	Well, I don't want to be the one holding you back. Good luck!
Furion is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Furion.
	I'll try to have the ball come your way.
Furion is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	Pathetic...That is no king.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Furion seems to be interested.
	These are for you, of course. Here.
Furion says he wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots he makes.
	Let's come up with a new strategy to give you more synergy.

You find Furion depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Furion is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Furion being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?
Furion is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Furion is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Furion is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Furion seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Furion who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Furion and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Furion looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Furion's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Furion seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Furion.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Furion and his opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Furion do?
	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Furion. What should you say?
	Well, Furion does have that kind of charm.
Furion is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Furion after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Fuse Ro
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Fuse Ro asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Fuse Ro suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Fuse Ro is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Fuse Ro has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Fuse Ro said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Fuse Ro. Fuse Ro seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Fuse Ro is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Fuse Ro was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Fuse Ro asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Fuse Ro falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Fuse Ro up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Fuse Ro having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Fuse Ro is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	The fans love your performance!
Fuse Ro scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Fuse Ro.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Fuse Ro falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Fuse Ro lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Fuse Ro. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Fuse Ro is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Fuse Ro brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Fuse Ro seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a myth. Forget about it.
With a serious face, Fuse Ro is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.
Fuse Ro came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Let's work up a solution.
Fuse Ro is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
	They support us from the shadows.
The team is having a good run and Fuse Ro is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
Fuse Ro seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
Fuse Ro seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
	Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Fuse Ro is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
	Flawless skills.
Fuse Ro is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
Fuse Ro plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
	We'll see about it after the League.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Fuse Ro and talk about what to do.
	Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.
Fuse Ro seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
	I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	I guess he's happy this is a good match.
Fuse Ro's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
	If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.
During a match, Fuse Ro bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
	We have to keep on going.
Fuse Ro is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
Fuse Ro is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Fuse Ro is starting to get intimidated.
	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

Gaphyl
You find Gaphyl depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Gaphyl is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.

Gerrard
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Gerrard is asking how he did in the match.
	You were picking the other team apart! It was awesome!
Gerrard looks excited as he's talking with the team about pets. He turns around and asks you what kind of pet you like.
	I like puppies. The loyal ones!
You come across Gerrard thinking about the value of soccer. What should we tell him?
	I feel something when I overpower my opponents on the field.
Gerrard is having trouble focusing on the match because of the affectionate emotion he feels. He says he must leave now to propose to his lover. What should we say?
	You don't need to be the one being dragged around.
Gerrard blushes up and tells you that he's happy he can play soccer with you. What should we tell him?
	*Smiles bitterly*
Gerrard is asking for special training sessions because he's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell him?
	Sure. Let's get on to it.
Gerrard did his best, but he failed to achieve the results he wanted and looks sad. We should say something to him.
	Sorry, I feel that this is on me.
Gerrard is asking you about what you like besides soccer.
	Rugby, a sport of strength!
Gerrard feels his heart races when he sees Littre.
	...That's not a rabbit.
Kuma is caught sneaking in the woman's locker room once again. We should talk with Gerrard about what to do with him.
	Let's make him put on Ogre's underwear.
Gerrard continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Guide him by kicking the ball toward the weak link in the opponent's defense.)
Gerrard is being annoying with his offensive words. What should we do?
	(Ignore it.)
It's dinner time and Gerrard is staring at his carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Eat it instead of him.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Gerrard to do?
	Wake them up. Kick them if you need to.
Gerrard says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	We shouldn't throw away food. Let's give it to somebody else.
Gerrard is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop him?
	(Step on the referee's foot and pretend it was an accident.)
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Gerrard running up ahead.
	(Let him steal your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Gerrard's shoe.
	(Tell Gerrard who did this.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Leave it to Gerrard.)
Gerrard hurt his leg during the 1st half of the match, but he insists on playing. What should we tell him?
	Okay. You make them pay, understand?

Gerrard is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's all thanks to you.

Grace
Grace says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Grace asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Grace is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Grace looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Grace says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Grace wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Grace is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Grace says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Grace says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Grace seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Grace is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Grace says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Grace seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Grace is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Grace went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of her when she comes back.
Grace claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Grace seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Grace says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Grace hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Grace says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Grace asks what you think is the most important ability in soccer. Give her an answer.
	Excitement and elegance. The fans love it.
Grace is criticizing the male teammates that were mesmerized by Lilith during the match. It's your job to defend your teammates.
	I think they're also mesmerized by you. You have a charm that matches a demon...
Being too excited, Grace is overreacting while talking about the game. It seems she wants people to agree with her.
	Yeah. The sight of you running on the field was marvelous.
Grace is asking what it would be like to date an alien. Give her your opinion.
	I believe it'll be romantic.
Grace seems to be planning to enter for the Galaxy League Mascot Contest. Let's talk to her.
	Mascot? More like a super model. You're too good looking to be a mere mascot.
Grace asks what your plans are for the holidays when there's no training or match. Give her an answer.
	(Meet up with my lover.)
Grace heard stories about the world of the demons and asks what you think it'll be like.
	It'll sure be dangerous, but I think it'll be a place full of thrills and wonders.
Grace, who seems to be interested in Eve, is asking your opinion about her. What should we tell her?
	Maybe she would be too much for you.
Recently, Grace seems to enjoy chatting with Jin. She thinks Jin is funny. Let's talk with her.
	I didn't know you were into old men.
Grace is thinking about how to resist the psychological and mental attacks that the demons enjoy using. Let's give her advice.
	How about you just go with the flow?
Grace is worried about Vermilion Bird. She thinks something is troubling Vermilion Bird.
	Didn't she grow up being friends with the princess? I think I know what's going on...
Grace's uniform is all messed up because of the filthy plays of her opponent. What should we do?
	(It won't be long until the opponent becomes mesmerized by Grace's charms.)
A defender on the other team seems to have fallen in love with Grace and is chasing her around the field. It looks like the player forgot about the match. What should we do?
	Nobody can resist that charm of yours.
Kaidormu of the United Explorers is praising Grace's plays. Let's add in.
	Yeah, she's as charming as you!
The team became furious after seeing Grace fall by the focused attack of the opposing team and used that fury to win the game. Let's say something.
	Your beauty is a curse...
Grace is having trouble finding a Spirit Stone that fits her needs and taste. Let's give her advice.
	How about Metatron's Will? It's cute with the butterfly decorations.
Grace is asking about the whereabouts of a teammate that hasn't seen for quite a while. Let's give her an answer.
	I used him as training material so that he could be useful to you.
Grace is planning to go on a blind date with a close teammate. Should we say something to her?
	Don't get greedy and go for all of the men.
It seems that Grace is wondering what to do after a teammate proposed to her. It doesn't seem that she's not entirely uninterested. What should we do?
	Just make sure that it doesn't affect him on the field.
Grace is teasing her opponent that is having a hard time chasing her. What should we do?
	Well, that player is kind of cute...

Griffith
Griffith is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Griffith is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Griffith wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Griffith is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Griffith is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Griffith is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Griffith says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Griffith seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Griffith in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Griffith is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Griffith says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Griffith says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Griffith picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Griffith is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Griffith thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

You find Griffith depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Griffith is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Griffith being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Griffith is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Griffith is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Griffith is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Griffith seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Griffith who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Griffith and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Griffith looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Griffith's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Griffith seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Griffith.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Griffith and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Griffith do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Griffith. What should you say?
	Well, Griffith does have that kind of charm.
Griffith is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Griffith after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Guinevere
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Guinevere asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!

	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.

	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this.

	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!

	Care to receive the ball with your face?

	Stop right there!
