	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Helen is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Helen thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Helen seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	They say the fortune-telling is inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
With a serious face, Helen is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	A way that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Helen came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Just please go with that boring strategy.
Helen is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Helen is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Helen seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Helen seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Helen is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Helen is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Helen plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Helen and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Helen seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Helen's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Helen bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Helen is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Helen is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Helen is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

Helena
Helena is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	The other team went home crying!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Helena comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
You're talking to Helena about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.
Helena is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
	It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
Helena is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
	Make the scouters fall in love with your performance!
Helena isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Helena for solutions.
	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this. 
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Helena and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	There's no time for tears! Find out who did this and bring justice!
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
According to Helena's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	William doesn't know how to respect his seniors.
Helena thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	...Sometimes, the truth is better to be left a secret.
Helena won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	What about soccer? You'll have to go through me to go on that trip!
Helena suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Care to receive the ball with your face?
You're sick and in bed when Helena and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	You guys...I'm about to cry...
The match and the concert that Helena was looking for start at the same time...
	Channel that sorrow and rage towards your opponents and make them pay.
Helena wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Stop right there!
The match started and Helena is standing still doing nothing.
	Run! Just start running!

Helena says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	I'm sure that you're being a good influence to the team.
Helena asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I guess I'll be chasing you on the road of glory.
Helena is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	I think they're cute and elegant if you leave out the pig and bear. 
Helena looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	The space has prepared this beautiful stage for you.
Helena says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	They're young but they have passion.
Helena wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Thankful beings that will be our +160.
Helena is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	How about we make it to the top of the Galaxy League and shine the universe with the light within us?
Helena says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	Tell them they should remember that they play for you.
Helena says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	Did she think that you'll take over the throne?
Helena seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Good for you! I know it's hard for you to find someone at your level!
Helena is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	I don't think you need to worry about a diet.
Helena says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Ask her if she likes you and if she wants to join our team.
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Helena seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	You both need to be disciplined by Helena.
Helena is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	You seem like the princess...Scratch that, the queen.
Helena went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	I feel sorry for the other team.
Helena claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	I don't care what the case is.
Helena seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Be careful not to be stomped on...
Helena says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	That's strange. I thought he was more of an authoritative character.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Helena hands you a present.
	(A chocker with a pretty radical design.)
Helena says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	That's a mixture of mockery, sympathy, and love.

Hercules
Hercules is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Hercules, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Hercules announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Hercules is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Hercules wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Hercules is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Hercules? Nah, he never gets lost.
You find Hercules lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Hercules says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Hercules wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Hercules caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Hercules some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Hercules seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Hercules came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Hercules is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Hercules seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Hercules looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Hercules to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)

	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.

	The door's over there.

	It can't be perfect every time.

	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and Hermod is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.

	It's your fault.

	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Hermod for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.
Hermod is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
Hermod seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.

	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
Hermod is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

	Don't mind it. It's our fault. We weren't able to make use of your strength.
Hermod is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be anxious. Have faith and keep following me.

	Don't worry, I'll go with you.
Hermod is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I'm afraid to be honest.
Hermod is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	I see. We must be careful. I'll be watching over you.
Hermod is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	Let's solve the problems one by one.
Hermod seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	It's thanks to you! Thanks for listening to my instructions!
You come across Hermod who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Trust me and your teammates. Sit this one out.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Is Marilyn your mother or nanny?
You're watching the storm with Hermod and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	Is something troubling her? I'm having a bad feeling.
Hermod looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Don't worry. Leave it up to me.
Hermod's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Hermod seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	You're doing fine. Don't play your opponent's game.

	I think he felt better because of the positive energy you always have around you.

	Let's ignore them and get ready for the match.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Hermod and her opponent isn't over yet.
	I've never seen her worked up that much.

	We didn't play dirty, right?

	Don't worry about me! Do your job!

	Hermod was fantastic on the field, right?

Hines
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Hines asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	What, are you expecting something like ''I feel like I'm in heaven'' or something?
Hines suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How could you think about eating at a time like this? I'm disappointed in you.
Hines is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Just nod your head.)
Hines has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
As Hines said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.
The crowd is cheering for Hines. Hines seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	How about just accepting the compliments for today?
Hines is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.
Hines was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!
The team will not have a match for some time. Hines asks you about your plan.
	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Hines falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Hines up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Hines having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Hines is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Hines scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Hines.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Hines falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Hines lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Hines. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Hines is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Hines brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

Hines is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to him.
	We haven't awakened our TRUE powers! We have to go further beyond!
Hines is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help him?
	It's the place where the chosen ones learn about their destiny.
Hines wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	All goes as planned...Hmm? Just ignore that.
Hines is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became his life. Let's talk with him.
	And that's how we walk towards our destiny.
Hines is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give him an opinion.
	This is your chance to buy the hottest fashion items in space!
Hines is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My friends from previous life...They would be pleased to see me win.
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	I'm going to check out the new comic issues. Wanna come along?
Hines says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	Hmm, a revived person that forgot his purpose...Reminds me of somebody.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	What a depressing weather...
Hines seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	That's a dangerous secret you're trying to find out about. Do you still want to know?
Ogre's pony tail slapped Hines in the face!
	Even his hair is a weapon! Is that even allowed?
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	I guess I finally get to meet my archnemesis.
Hines is suddenly showing massive improvement in his performance. He must've learned something during a match.
	I knew this day would come.
Hines says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They were sacrificed as material for a greater cause.
Hines says he forgot to use his skill points before entering the match. What should we say to him?
	You can only find your true potential when you don't rely on your skills!
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	Fontus...You sure are my archnemesis!
Hines picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	So, this is how the revelation begins!
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	Come back Huginn! Wait, is it Muninn?
Hines is irritated because his opponent has the attribute advantage over him.
	It's time, Hines! Awaken the 6th attribute and show your true powers!
Hines thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	That's because you haven't opened up your ''third eye''!

Hiro
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Hiro asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Hiro suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Hiro is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Hiro has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Hiro said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Hiro. Hiro seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Hiro is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Hiro was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Hiro asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Hiro falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Hiro up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Hiro having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Hiro is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	The fans love your performance!
Hiro scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Hiro.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Hiro falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Hiro lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Hiro. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Hiro is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Hiro brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

You come across Hiro, who was overwhelmed by his opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer him up.
	Those scumbags played dirty. Ugh, I'm angry!
Hiro is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	I'm not comfortable with this conversation.
Hiro, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal what your agenda really is. What should we say?
	To bring justice with soccer. That's all.
Hiro says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give him an answer.
	Let's do our best until the very end!
You're having a conversation with Hiro about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell him what you think.
	I won't rely on Spirit Stones.
Hiro is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	I like what you just said.
Let's talk to Hiro who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	It's a place to rest for the good.
Hiro is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell him your thoughts.
	It's something I'd want to see again with a person I care.
The teammates are speaking highly of Hiro, saying he's a good role model. Let's add in.
	He's truly a role model to us all with his skills and attitude.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I feel sorry, but that's irrelevant to the match.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Hiro wants to say a word.
	Come on guys, you know it's an exciting thing to be playing against a strong team! Keep your heads up high!
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	So, there are no real illegal matches. I guess I'm relieved.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	We will confront them fair and square, and win.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	Would she be happy if she finds out you're doing this?
Hiro points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	That's too convenient to be a coincidence.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Hiro seems to be surprised.
	Well, what do you know! They have some decency in them after all.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Hiro is asking for help.
	I hope the demon didn't say anything stupid.
Cracsus threatens to hack Hiro's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	Don't fall for this cheap shot.
Hiro is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	Then we should do our very best to win.
Hiro is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	I don't like the word oblivion.

Honesia

	Yeah. The sight of you running on the field was marvelous.

	I believe it'll be romantic.

	(Meet up with my lover.)

	Maybe she would be too much for you.

	I didn't know you were into old men.

	How about you just go with the flow?

	Didn't she grow up being friends with the princess? I think I know what's going on...

	(It won't be long until the opponent becomes mesmerized by Honesia's charms.)

	Nobody can resist that charm of yours.

	Yeah, she's as charming as you!

	Your beauty is a curse...

	I used him as training material so that he could be useful to you.

	Don't get greedy and go for all of the men.

	Well, that player is kind of cute...

Irru

	I have faith in you.
James is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
James wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that James is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	James? Nah, he never gets lost.
You find James lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
James says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
James wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
James caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give James some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. James seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
James came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
James is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. James seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
James looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with James to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

James seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a myth. Forget about it.
With a serious face, James is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.
James came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Let's work up a solution.
James is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
	They support us from the shadows.
The team is having a good run and James is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
James seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
James seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
	Maybe if you increase your Strength...
James is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
	Flawless skills.
James is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
James plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
	We'll see about it after the League.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with James and talk about what to do.
	Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.
James seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
	I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	I guess he's happy this is a good match.
James's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
	If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.
During a match, James bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
	We have to keep on going.
James is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
James is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. James is starting to get intimidated.
	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

Jang
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Jang asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Jang suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Jang is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Jang has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Jang said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Jang. Jang seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Jang is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Jang was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Jang asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Jang falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Jang up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Jang having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Jang is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	The fans love your performance!
Jang scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Jang.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Jang falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Jang lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Jang. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Jang is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Jang brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Jang is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Jang, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Jang announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Jang is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Jang wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Jang is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Jang? Nah, he never gets lost.
You find Jang lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Jang says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Jang wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Jang caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Jang some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Jang seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Jang came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Jang is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Jang seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Jang looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Jang to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Jay
Jay is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	To win all the way, of course.
Jay is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
Jay seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
Jay is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
Jay is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.

	The door's over there.

	It can't be perfect every time.

	It's your fault.

	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Jay for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.

Jay seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.

Jayce
Jayce is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's all thanks to you.
After a meeting, Jayce's eyes met yours a several times and Jayce asks if he has something on his face.
	I was just thinking the team became stronger, thanks to you.
With a serious look on his face, Jayce warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	I'm surprised you said that. I won't ask what happened to you.
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Jayce on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	You and I are already perfect. So I guess that means we shouldn't be saying our names.
Jayce is worried that he has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell him?
	You're the most dangerous of them all.
Jayce is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to him.
	Let's go tell the manager.
Jayce is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give him an answer.
	I think that may be you.
You find Jayce being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Nice play! Fantastic!
Jayce is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help him out.
	Just calm down a bit. You got this.
Jayce is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	He's just material for leveling up.
Jayce doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't portray your awesome performance.
It's Jayce's birthday. Let's give him a present.
	This is a championship trophy replica for you. The designs are inspired by you.
You see Jayce's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Jayce. What should we do?
	He is probably not even listening...
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	It's time for some good food.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Jayce's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to him?
	This won't be the end of your rival. 
Jayce comes to you and says that he has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	Well, I don't want to be the one holding you back. Good luck!
Jayce is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Jayce.
	I'll try to have the ball come your way.
Jayce is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	Pathetic...That is no king.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Jayce seems to be interested.
	These are for you, of course. Here.
Jayce says he wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots he makes.
	Let's come up with a new strategy to give you more synergy.

Jayce is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	The other team went home crying!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Jayce comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
You're talking to Jayce about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell him your answer.
	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.
Jayce is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to him.
	It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
Jayce is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give him some advice.
	Make the scouters fall in love with your performance!
Jayce isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. He feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Jayce for solutions.
	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this. 
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Jayce and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	There's no time for tears! Find out who did this and bring justice!
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
According to Jayce's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	William doesn't know how to respect his seniors.
Jayce thinks he knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	...Sometimes, the truth is better to be left a secret.
Jayce won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	What about soccer? You'll have to go through me to go on that trip!
Jayce suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Care to receive the ball with your face?
You're sick and in bed when Jayce and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	You guys...I'm about to cry...
The match and the concert that Jayce was looking for start at the same time...
	Channel that sorrow and rage towards your opponents and make them pay.
Jayce wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Stop right there!
The match started and Jayce is standing still doing nothing.
	Run! Just start running!

Jean
You find Jean depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Jean is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Jean being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?
Jean is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Jean is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Jean is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Jean seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Jean who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Jean and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Jean looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Jean's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Jean seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Jean.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Jean and his opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Jean do?
	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)

	They will never learn with an attitude like that.

Jean is angry because he was criticized by his performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give him an answer.
	I admit it. You're the best in the team.

	I know.

	(He wants you to be a good listener.)
Jean looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
	What were you expecting? An intergalactic war?

	Just say it. You're jealous.

	You're as good as they are, I'd say you deserve more credit.

	He's popular, just not as much as me.

	Patting you on the head? He must not fear for his life!

	I like how they don't mind physical flaws.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Jean seems confused.
	Well, one thing is for sure. One of them did something stupid.

	I hope that baby comes to be a great soccer player, just like you.
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
	Hmm? What's wrong everybody?
Jean refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to him.
	Well that's absolutely fine if you can actually prove that you're the best.

	I think that's a good choice.
Jean seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give him some advice.
	With your skills and dedication, I have no doubt that you will.
Jean looks sad because he feels his friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to him?

	You really help us a lot in these situations.

	Let's leave her alone. She may find all this attention uncomfortable.

The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Jenny do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Jenny. What should you say?
	Well, Jenny does have that kind of charm.
Jenny is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Jenny after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Jenny is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
	What could it be? Money? Luck? Weather? Hmm? What?
Jenny, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've been chased by a soccer ball monster in my dreams. It was terrifying.
Jenny announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
	You'll have to compete with me!
Jenny is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
	Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.
Jenny wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
	It'll be pretty exciting if we could stay the same even after 10 years.
It seems that Jenny is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Listen carefully and you'll find her.
You find Jenny lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Stop wandering around the kids snack corner!
Jenny says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Hmm? That is odd...What do you think about this?
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	I'll tackle him down! Knock his lights out!
Jenny wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	What about just watching?
Jenny caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	You came to see my marvelous moves? I'm flattered. 
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Jenny some orders.
	Pass? Shoot? Forfeit? Argh! Just make a run for it!
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	Stop right there, pig!
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Jenny seems to be worried.
	Let's just go. That player will also feel uncomfortable if we keep standing here.
Jenny came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	What happened to you? Do you want me to lend you some money?
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...It's about to go down...! Where's the popcorn?

	Who could've done such a hideous thing?

	Okay! Now I'll tell you all the good stuff about Jenny!

	How about we ask Jeunese?
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Jenny to set some simple rules.
	Come on, I'll show you the best spots around!

Jess
Jess is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Jess, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Jess announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Jess is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Jess wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Jess is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Jess? Nah, he never gets lost.
You find Jess lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Jess says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Jess wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Jess caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Jess some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Jess seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Jess came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Jess is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Jess seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Jess looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Jess to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Jess is asking how he did in the match.
	You bring the best out of the team. Good work!
Jess looks excited as he's talking with the team about pets. He turns around and asks you what kind of pet you like.
	I think that a baby duck following its mother is one of the most adorable things to watch.
You come across Jess thinking about the value of soccer. What should we tell him?
	The field is a ground of hopes and dreams. Isn't that enough?
Jess is having trouble focusing on the match because of the affectionate emotion he feels. He says he must leave now to propose to his lover. What should we say?
	Think about your teammates that are counting on you.
Jess blushes up and tells you that he's happy he can play soccer with you. What should we tell him?
	Me too. You're a good leader.
Jess is asking for special training sessions because he's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell him?
	If that's your wish.
Jess did his best, but he failed to achieve the results he wanted and looks sad. We should say something to him.
	It's experiences like this that bonds us together.
Jess is asking you about what you like besides soccer.
	I like board games about war. I admire famous commanders.
Jess feels his heart races when he sees Littre.
	...Do you want a Superb Power-up?
Kuma is caught sneaking in the woman's locker room once again. We should talk with Jess about what to do with him.
	I'm not sure if it's safe, but we can use him for leveling up.
Jess continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Make a strategic decision.)
Jess is being annoying with his offensive words. What should we do?
	(Kick him out of the team if things can't be handled.)
It's dinner time and Jess is staring at his carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Tell him that carrots are good for the body and to eat it all.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Jess to do?
	They all need scolding.
Jess says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	Let's stay away from the soup, just in case.
Jess is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop him?
	Ignore the referee. Focus on the match.
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Jess running up ahead.
	(Catch up and share your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Jess's shoe.
	(Remove the tack and tell the manager on the other team.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Wake the player up and continue with the meeting.)
Jess hurt his leg during the 1st half of the match, but he insists on playing. What should we tell him?
	Don't push yourself too hard. There are a lot of matches left.

Jeunese
Jeunese is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to him.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Jeunese is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help him?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Jeunese wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Jeunese is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became his life. Let's talk with him.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Jeunese is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give him an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Jeunese is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Jeunese says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.

	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Jeunese seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Jeunese in the face!
	That must hurt.

	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Jeunese is suddenly showing massive improvement in his performance. He must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Jeunese says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Jeunese says he forgot to use his skill points before entering the match. What should we say to him?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Jeunese picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!

	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Jeunese thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Jeunese says he's the center of the team and asks if you agree with him. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.

	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Jeunese is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?

	Do you think any of those comets are populated?

	Teach them how adults play soccer.

	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.

	That's deep. I think it's cool.

	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Jeunese says that Bell seemed depressed when he told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.

	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!

	Please don't forget about the match.

	Is her name really Kiki?

	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?

	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Jeunese went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of him when he comes back.

	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?

	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?

	Maybe she's up to something.

Jibril
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Jibril asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	What, are you expecting something like ''I feel like I can fly'' or something?
Jibril suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How could you think about eating at a time like this? I'm disappointed in you.
Jibril is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Just nod your head.)
Jibril has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
As Jibril said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.
The crowd is cheering for Jibril. Jibril seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	How about just accepting the compliments for today?
Jibril is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.
Jibril was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!
The team will not have a match for some time. Jibril asks you about your plan.
	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Jibril falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Jibril up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Jibril having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Jibril is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Jibril scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Jibril.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Jibril falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Jibril lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Jibril. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Jibril is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Jibril brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

You come across Jibril, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	Those scumbags played dirty. Ugh, I'm angry!
Jibril is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	I'm not comfortable with this conversation.
Jibril, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	To bring justice with soccer. That's all.
Jibril says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	Let's do our best until the very end!
You're having a conversation with Jibril about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I won't rely on Spirit Stones.
Jibril is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	I like what you just said.
Let's talk to Jibril who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	It's a place to rest for the good.
Jibril is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	It's something I'd want to see again with a person I care.
The teammates are speaking highly of Jibril, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She's truly a role model to us all with her skills and attitude.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I feel sorry, but that's irrelevant to the match.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Jibril wants to say a word.
	Come on guys, you know it's an exciting thing to be playing against a strong team! Keep your heads up high!
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	So, there are no real illegal matches. I guess I'm relieved.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	We will confront them fair and square, and win.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	Would she be happy if she finds out you're doing this?
Jibril points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	That's too convenient to be a coincidence.

	Well, what do you know! They have some decency in them after all.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Jibril is asking for help.
	I hope the demon didn't say anything stupid.
Cracsus threatens to hack Jibril's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	Don't fall for this cheap shot.
Jibril is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	Then we should do our very best to win.
Jibril is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	I don't like the word oblivion.

	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Jiho brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

Jiho seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a myth. Forget about it.
With a serious face, Jiho is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.
Jiho came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Let's work up a solution.
Jiho is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They support us from the shadows.
The team is having a good run and Jiho is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
Jiho seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
Jiho seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Jiho is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Flawless skills.
Jiho is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
Jiho plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	We'll see about it after the League.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Jiho and talk about what to do.
	Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.
Jiho seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	I guess he's happy this is a good match.
Jiho's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.
During a match, Jiho bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	We have to keep on going.
Jiho is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
Jiho is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Jiho is starting to get intimidated.
	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

Jiho is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's a result of team effort.
After a meeting, Jiho's eyes met yours a several times and Jiho asks if she has something on her face.
	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.
With a serious look on her face, Jiho warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	Bathroom...It is indeed a very important matter...
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Jiho on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	I can't pick just one...
Jiho is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
	Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Jiho is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
	I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
Jiho is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
	Every teammate there by my side on the field is special.
You find Jiho being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Now we're starting to look like a team!
Jiho is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
	I'll teach you how to meditate to synchronize the breathing with other teammates.
Jiho is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
Jiho doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
It's Jiho's birthday. Let's give her a present.
	Here! I made some cookies with the team.
You see Jiho's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Jiho. What should we do?
	Let's see how long they last. Come on guys!
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Jiho's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to her?
	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?

	There will always be a place for you to return.
Jiho is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Jiho.
	We can overcome this with team effort.

	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.

	We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
Jiho says she wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots she makes.
	I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.

Jiho is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Jiho, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Jiho announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Jiho is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Jiho wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Jiho is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Jiho? Nah, she never gets lost.
You find Jiho lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Jiho says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Jiho wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Jiho caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Jiho some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.

	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.

	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.

	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.

	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Jiho looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Jiho to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.
