With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Juno for solutions.
	How about we put that advanced technology of Metro City to use?
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We could start a reset marathon.
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Juno and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	I could really use some grilled sweet potatoes and chestnuts.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	I think she's something more than just an idol.
According to Juno's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	I want to see Tyler's true characteristics.
Juno thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	Of course we should tell Lynbell! What are you waiting for?
Juno won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	...World? What about space? Isn't that more interesting?
Juno suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	What's the agenda here? Are you trying to taint the pure angels?
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	I didn't know I was a talented foot volleyball player!
You're sick and in bed when Juno and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	Get closer so I can spread my germs!
The match and the concert that Juno was looking for start at the same time...
	Let's hack the big screen so we can see the concert!
Juno wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	The character story left him a trauma.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	...Maybe he just likes cats!
The match started and Juno is standing still doing nothing.
	What is she doing? Is she a totem?

Juno says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Juno asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Juno is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Juno looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Juno says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Juno wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Juno is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Juno says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Juno says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Juno seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Juno is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Juno says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Juno seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Juno is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Juno went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of her when she comes back.
Juno claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Juno seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Juno says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Juno hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Juno says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Jury
Jury is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Jury is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Jury wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Jury is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Jury is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Jury is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Jury says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Jury seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Jury in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Jury is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Jury says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Jury says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Jury picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!

	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.

	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.

	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this.

	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!

	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!

	Care to receive the ball with your face?

	You guys...I'm about to cry...

	Stop right there!

	Run! Just start running!

Kaidormu
Kaidormu is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Kaidormu, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Kaidormu announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Kaidormu is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Kaidormu wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Kaidormu is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Kaidormu? Nah, he never gets lost.
You find Kaidormu lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Kaidormu says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Kaidormu wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Kaidormu caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Kaidormu some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Kaidormu seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Kaidormu came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Kaidormu is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Kaidormu seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Kaidormu looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Kaidormu to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Kaidormu seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
	Game results aren't that simple to be predicted by fortune-telling.
With a serious face, Kaidormu is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
	Being together is enough for me.
Kaidormu came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	I'm disappointed, too. Let's start over.
Kaidormu is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
	Even if they're not on the field with us, we're fighting as one. Right?
The team is having a good run and Kaidormu is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	Let's keep this momentum going!
Kaidormu seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Kaidormu seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
	Don't be weak.
Kaidormu is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
	Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Kaidormu is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Kaidormu plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
	I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Kaidormu and talk about what to do.
	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
Kaidormu seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great. 
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	...Uh...So no soccer?
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Kaidormu's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
	Remember that feeling and use it when things get tough.
During a match, Kaidormu bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
	It's something that happened during the match. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Kaidormu is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
	It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.
Kaidormu is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Kaidormu is starting to get intimidated.
	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

Kainen looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Kainen to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Kainen is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell him?
	Teamwork is what matters the most.
Kainen is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I have very specific standards for personality, looks, values, and background. Are you interested in hearing about it?
Kainen seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. He seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	I would like to hear what you think is the best team in the universe.
Kainen is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop him from causing any problems.
	That team is far from your style.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
	Is winning really worth going that far?
Kainen is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I..Respect your naming taste...
Kainen is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
	A mysterious villain...Bad taste, if you ask me.
Kainen is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Vicious? More like ugly.
Kainen is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	Passes that you prefer aren't always the right answer.
Kainen is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
	If you're up for suggestions, I'm all ears.
It's before the 2nd half, and Kainen is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	We should at least put up a fight so they remember us.
You forgot to lock Kainen and almost used him as training material! He looks very upset!
	It was all just to motivate you to become a better player!
Kainen is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
	Aren't you satisfied with your performance?
Kainen is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	I would've tried to find something that fits me.
The team is saying bad things about Kainen for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Skipping practice isn't something that's in his dictionary.
Kainen is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	Hmm...If only I could change the shape of the horns and the color of the scales. That'd be perfect.
Kainen seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him. 
	Everybody should grow up.
On a day off, Kainen is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	It's really hard to find the right person.
Kainen is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want my dreams to come true.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	What's done is done. Let's come up with a new design.

Kalkrish
Kalkrish is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's all thanks to you.
After a meeting, Kalkrish's eyes met yours a several times and Kalkrish asks if he has something on his face.
	I was just thinking the team became stronger, thanks to you.
With a serious look on his face, Kalkrish warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	I'm surprised you said that. I won't ask what happened to you.
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Kalkrish on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	You and I are already perfect. So I guess that means we shouldn't be saying our names.
Kalkrish is worried that he has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell him?
	You're the most dangerous of them all.
Kalkrish is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to him.
	Let's go tell the manager.
Kalkrish is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give him an answer.
	I think that may be you.
You find Kalkrish being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Nice play! Fantastic!
Kalkrish is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help him out.
	Just calm down a bit. You got this.
Kalkrish is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	He's just material for leveling up.
Kalkrish doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't portray your awesome performance.
It's Kalkrish's birthday. Let's give him a present.
	This is a championship trophy replica for you. The designs are inspired by you.
You see Kalkrish's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Kalkrish. What should we do?
	He is probably not even listening...
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	It's time for some good food.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Kalkrish's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to him?
	This won't be the end of your rival. 
Kalkrish comes to you and says that he has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	Well, I don't want to be the one holding you back. Good luck!
Kalkrish is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Kalkrish.
	I'll try to have the ball come your way.
Kalkrish is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	Pathetic...That is no king.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Kalkrish seems to be interested.
	These are for you, of course. Here.
Kalkrish says he wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots he makes.
	Let's come up with a new strategy to give you more synergy.

You find Kalkrish depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	Don't mind it. It's our fault. We weren't able to make use of your strength.
Kalkrish is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be anxious. Have faith and keep following me.
You come across Kalkrish being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Don't worry, I'll go with you.
Kalkrish is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I'm afraid to be honest.
Kalkrish is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	I see. We must be careful. I'll be watching over you.
Kalkrish is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	Let's solve the problems one by one.
Kalkrish seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	It's thanks to you! Thanks for listening to my instructions!
You come across Kalkrish who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Trust me and your teammates. Sit this one out.
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Is Marilyn your mother or nanny?
You're watching the storm with Kalkrish and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	Is something troubling her? I'm having a bad feeling.
Kalkrish looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Don't worry. Leave it up to me.
Kalkrish's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Kalkrish seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
	You're doing fine. Don't play your opponent's game.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Kalkrish.
	I think he felt better because of the positive energy you always have around you.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's ignore them and get ready for the match.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Kalkrish and his opponent isn't over yet.
	I've never seen him worked up that much.
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Kalkrish do?
	(Give him instructions so that he can do his share of the cleaning quickly.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	We didn't play dirty, right?
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Kalkrish. What should you say?
	I hope you two become good rivals.
Kalkrish is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Don't worry about me! Do your job!
Latios is chatting with Kalkrish after the match. Let's barge in.
	Kalkrish was fantastic on the field, right?

Karpila
Karpila is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Karpila is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Karpila wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Karpila is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Karpila is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Karpila is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Karpila says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Karpila seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Karpila in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Karpila is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Karpila says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Karpila says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Karpila picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Karpila is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Karpila thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Karpila seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	They say the fortune-telling is inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
With a serious face, Karpila is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	A way that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Karpila came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Just please go with that boring strategy.
Karpila is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Karpila is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Karpila seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Karpila seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Karpila is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Karpila is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Karpila plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Karpila and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Karpila seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Karpila's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Karpila bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Karpila is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Karpila is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Karpila is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

	...It's about to go down...! Where's the popcorn?

	Come on, I'll show you the best spots around!

Kevin

	...We should get out of here.

	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)

	It's space. Anything can exist here.

	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Kevin is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give him an answer.
	We have a strong lineup of players that make our star players shine brighter.
Kevin is angry because he was criticized by his performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give him an answer.
	I admit it. You're the best in the team.

	I know.
Kevin wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?
	(He wants you to be a good listener.)
Kevin looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
	What were you expecting? An intergalactic war?
Kevin seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to him.
	Just say it. You're jealous.
Kevin is talking about how famous his rivals are in the Galaxy League. He seems jealous. Let's talk to him.
	You're as good as they are, I'd say you deserve more credit.
Kevin is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
	He's popular, just not as much as me.
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Kevin on the head while teasing him, and then goes away. Kevin seems angry...
	Patting you on the head? He must not fear for his life!
The team is at Metro City. Kevin seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
	I like how they don't mind physical flaws.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Kevin seems confused.
	Well, one thing is for sure. One of them did something stupid.
Kevin is spreading the happy news about his cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate him.
	I hope that baby comes to be a great soccer player, just like you.
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
	Hmm? What's wrong everybody?
Kevin refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to him.
	Well that's absolutely fine if you can actually prove that you're the best.
Kevin is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?
	Considering your personality, I think she'll accept you.
Kevin seems to be interested in the Micrinum from Kiri, which is said to be good for beauty and anti-aging. Let's talk to him.
	I think that's a good choice.
Kevin seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give him some advice.
	With your skills and dedication, I have no doubt that you will.
Kevin looks sad because he feels his friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to him?
	If your friend is truly your friend, he will understand.
It's a tough match, but Kevin is standing tall and encouraging the team. What should we say to him?
	You really help us a lot in these situations.
A teammate that is a former member of the Dark Sisters is down sick, suffering from the aftermath of performing exorcism. Let's talk with Kevin about what to do.
	Let's leave her alone. She may find all this attention uncomfortable.

Khirel
Khirel is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell him?
	Best of 4 should be our goal.
Khirel is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I think that being able to understand each other is the most important.
Khirel seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. He seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	It's within our grasp.
Khirel is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop him from causing any problems.
	The honor of our opponent is also important.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
	Be true to yourself.
Khirel is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I'm sure you're going to become an intergalactic fool.
Khirel is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
	We must have faith in the Gate Keepers and win the Galaxy League.
Khirel is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Are you giving up before putting up a fight?
Khirel is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	This needs to be analyzed and fixed. Can you help me?
Khirel is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
	No, it's not boring.
It's before the 2nd half, and Khirel is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	Don't give up until the end.
You forgot to lock Khirel and almost used him as training material! He looks very upset!
	It's my fault.
Khirel is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
	You deserve it. Well done!
Khirel is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	I would've been doing something to save the universe.
The team is saying bad things about Khirel for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Do you really think that he would skip practice?
Khirel is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Khirel seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him. 
	Let's go look for him.
On a day off, Khirel is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	I'd love to have a stable job first.
Khirel is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I just don't want to waste a single day in my life.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	Let's split up and find the uniforms.

Khirel seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
	Game results aren't that simple to be predicted by fortune-telling.
With a serious face, Khirel is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
	Being together is enough for me.
Khirel came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	I'm disappointed, too. Let's start over.
Khirel is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
	Even if they're not on the field with us, we're fighting as one. Right?
The team is having a good run and Khirel is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	Let's keep this momentum going!
Khirel seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Khirel seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
	Don't be weak.
Khirel is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
	Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Khirel is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Khirel plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
	I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Khirel and talk about what to do.
	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
Khirel seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great. 
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	...Uh...So no soccer?
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Khirel's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
	Remember that feeling and use it when things get tough.
During a match, Khirel bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
	It's something that happened during the match. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Khirel is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
	It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.
Khirel is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Khirel is starting to get intimidated.
	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

Kiki
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Kiki asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Kiki suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Kiki is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Pat her on the head.)
Kiki has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Kiki said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Kiki. Kiki seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Kiki is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I am so thankful to them.
Kiki was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Kiki asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Kiki falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Kiki up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Kiki having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Kiki is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Kiki scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Kiki.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Kiki falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Kiki lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give her some heals?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Kiki. Let's talk to her.
	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Kiki is curious and wants to take a look.
	They must love volunteer work!
Kiki brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

You find Kiki depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Kiki is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Kiki being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Kiki is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Kiki is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Kiki is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Kiki seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Kiki who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Kiki and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Kiki looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Kiki's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Kiki seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Kiki.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Kiki and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Kiki do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Kiki. What should you say?
	Well, Kiki does have that kind of charm.
Kiki is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Kiki after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Kirin
Kirin is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to him.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Kirin is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help him?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Kirin wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Kirin is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became his life. Let's talk with him.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!

	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!

	My fans!

	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Kirin says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Kirin seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Kirin in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Kirin is suddenly showing massive improvement in his performance. He must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Kirin says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Kirin says he forgot to use his skill points before entering the match. What should we say to him?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Kirin picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Kirin is irritated because his opponent has the attribute advantage over him.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Kirin thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Kirin says he's the center of the team and asks if you agree with him. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Kirin asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give him a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Kirin is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Kirin looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to him?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Kirin says he's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give him an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Kirin wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give him an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Kirin is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to him.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Kirin says he was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Kirin says that Bell seemed depressed when he told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Kirin seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell him?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Kirin is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Kirin says he's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Kirin seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Kirin is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Kirin went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of him when he comes back.
Kirin claims he saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Kirin seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Kirin says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Kirin hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Kirin says that he thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give him an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

	I didn't know you were into old men.
Leah is thinking about how to resist the psychological and mental attacks that the demons enjoy using. Let's give her advice.
	How about you just go with the flow?
Leah is worried about Vermilion Bird. She thinks something is troubling Vermilion Bird.
	Didn't she grow up being friends with the princess? I think I know what's going on...
Leah's uniform is all messed up because of the filthy plays of her opponent. What should we do?
	(It won't be long until the opponent becomes mesmerized by Leah's charms.)
A defender on the other team seems to have fallen in love with Leah and is chasing her around the field. It looks like the player forgot about the match. What should we do?
	Nobody can resist that charm of yours.
Kaidormu of the United Explorers is praising Leah's plays. Let's add in.
	Yeah, she's as charming as you!
The team became furious after seeing Leah fall by the focused attack of the opposing team and used that fury to win the game. Let's say something.
	Your beauty is a curse...
Leah is having trouble finding a Spirit Stone that fits her needs and taste. Let's give her advice.
	How about Metatron's Will? It's cute with the butterfly decorations.
Leah is asking about the whereabouts of a teammate that hasn't seen for quite a while. Let's give her an answer.
	I used him as training material so that he could be useful to you.
Leah is planning to go on a blind date with a close teammate. Should we say something to her?
	Don't get greedy and go for all of the men.
It seems that Leah is wondering what to do after a teammate proposed to her. It doesn't seem that she's not entirely uninterested. What should we do?
	Just make sure that it doesn't affect him on the field.
Leah is teasing her opponent that is having a hard time chasing her. What should we do?
	Well, that player is kind of cute...

Leah says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Of course! Everybody is counting on you!
Leah asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I want to see everybody smile. I think that'll make me happy.
Leah is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	I'd like to keep one as a pet.
Leah looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Where do you think those comets are going?

	Yeah, I mean they could get hurt.

	I'm planning to make a whole line of merchandise with them as the character.

	Life is a light of its own.

	Just hear them out and smile. They'll feel better.

	I sense that there's something she hasn't told us yet...

	Congratulations! How did you guys get along?

	You're playing soccer! You're fine!

	Tell her to be our lap cat.

	She seems like a nice girl.
Leah went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	Leah is in danger! We have to save her!

	She must've made a mistake.

	We can do this! Let's go!

	Yeah, they get along pretty well.

	(A cute and pretty pendant)
Leah says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	I think she likes him.

Leina
You find Leina depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	Don't mind it. It's our fault. We weren't able to make use of your strength.

	Don't be anxious. Have faith and keep following me.

	I'm afraid to be honest.

	Is something troubling her? I'm having a bad feeling.

	Don't worry. Leave it up to me.

	You're doing fine. Don't play your opponent's game.

	Let's ignore them and get ready for the match.

	I've never seen her worked up that much.

	Don't worry about me! Do your job!

	Leina was fantastic on the field, right?

	Of course! Everybody is counting on you!
Lia asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I want to see everybody smile. I think that'll make me happy.
Lia is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	I'd like to keep one as a pet.
Lia looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Where do you think those comets are going?
Lia says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Yeah, I mean they could get hurt.
Lia wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	I'm planning to make a whole line of merchandise with them as the character.
Lia is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	Life is a light of its own.
Lia says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	Just hear them out and smile. They'll feel better.
Lia says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	I sense that there's something she hasn't told us yet...
Lia seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Congratulations! How did you guys get along?
Lia is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	You're playing soccer! You're fine!
Lia says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Tell her to be our lap cat.
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Lia seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you guys keep giving Lia trouble, I swear to god I'll use you both as special training material.
Lia is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	She seems like a nice girl.
Lia went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	Lia is in danger! We have to save her!
Lia claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	She must've made a mistake.
Lia seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	We can do this! Let's go!
Lia says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Yeah, they get along pretty well.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Lia hands you a present.
	(A cute and pretty pendant)
Lia says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	I think she likes him.

Lilith
Lilith says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Lilith asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Lilith is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Lilith looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Lilith says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Lilith wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Lilith is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Lilith says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Lilith says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Lilith seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Lilith is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Lilith says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Lilith seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Lilith is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Lilith went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of her when she comes back.
Lilith claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Lilith seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Lilith says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Lilith hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Lilith says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Lilith asks what you think is the most important ability in soccer. Give her an answer.
	Excitement and elegance. The fans love it.
Lilith is criticizing the male teammates that were mesmerized by Lilith during the match. It's your job to defend your teammates.
	I think they're also mesmerized by you. You have a charm that matches a demon...
Being too excited, Lilith is overreacting while talking about the game. It seems she wants people to agree with her.
	Yeah. The sight of you running on the field was marvelous.
Lilith is asking what it would be like to date an alien. Give her your opinion.
	I believe it'll be romantic.
Lilith seems to be planning to enter for the Galaxy League Mascot Contest. Let's talk to her.
	Mascot? More like a super model. You're too good looking to be a mere mascot.
Lilith asks what your plans are for the holidays when there's no training or match. Give her an answer.
	(Meet up with my lover.)
Lilith heard stories about the world of the demons and asks what you think it'll be like.
	It'll sure be dangerous, but I think it'll be a place full of thrills and wonders.
Lilith, who seems to be interested in Eve, is asking your opinion about her. What should we tell her?
	Maybe she would be too much for you.
Recently, Lilith seems to enjoy chatting with Jin. She thinks Jin is funny. Let's talk with her.
	I didn't know you were into old men.
Lilith is thinking about how to resist the psychological and mental attacks that the demons enjoy using. Let's give her advice.
	How about you just go with the flow?
Lilith is worried about Vermilion Bird. She thinks something is troubling Vermilion Bird.
	Didn't she grow up being friends with the princess? I think I know what's going on...
Lilith's uniform is all messed up because of the filthy plays of her opponent. What should we do?
	(It won't be long until the opponent becomes mesmerized by Lilith's charms.)
A defender on the other team seems to have fallen in love with Lilith and is chasing her around the field. It looks like the player forgot about the match. What should we do?
	Nobody can resist that charm of yours.
Kaidormu of the United Explorers is praising Lilith's plays. Let's add in.
	Yeah, she's as charming as you!
The team became furious after seeing Lilith fall by the focused attack of the opposing team and used that fury to win the game. Let's say something.
	Your beauty is a curse...
Lilith is having trouble finding a Spirit Stone that fits her needs and taste. Let's give her advice.
	How about Metatron's Will? It's cute with the butterfly decorations.
Lilith is asking about the whereabouts of a teammate that hasn't seen for quite a while. Let's give her an answer.
	I used him as training material so that he could be useful to you.
Lilith is planning to go on a blind date with a close teammate. Should we say something to her?
	Don't get greedy and go for all of the men.
It seems that Lilith is wondering what to do after a teammate proposed to her. It doesn't seem that she's not entirely uninterested. What should we do?
	Just make sure that it doesn't affect him on the field.
Lilith is teasing her opponent that is having a hard time chasing her. What should we do?
	Well, that player is kind of cute...

Lily
Lily is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	To win all the way, of course.
Lily is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
Lily seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
Lily is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
Lily is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	Cool! Keep it up!
Lily is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	It's silly of you to worry about such things. Are you feeling okay?
Lily is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	The door's over there.
Lily is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	It can't be perfect every time.
Lily is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and Lily is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.
You forgot to lock Lily and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's your fault.
Lily is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Nicely done! We're throwing a party today!
Lily is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Lily for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.
Lily is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
Lily seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.
On a day off, Lily is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
Lily is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

You find Lily depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	It's not your fault that you fell during the match. Don't worry about it!
Lily is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be all negative because there were some mistakes. You're a precious part of this team.
You come across Lily being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Don't use that ability on the field...
Lily is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	Stay by my side and make sure I don't make any mistakes, will you?
Lily is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	I'll sleep by your side tonight.
Lily is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	It's not your fault. It's your mistakes that took the opponents off guard.
Lily seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	Perfect! No mistakes made!
You come across Lily who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	I think I'll get injured too if you're on the field. Please sit on the bench.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Ramen, that's a dangerous food to cook.
You're watching the storm with Lily and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	She shines even in the darkest storms! How gorgeous!
Lily looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Did you prepare your meds in case you get space-sick? Never mind, I'll prepare the meds.
Lily's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Lily seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	I think that player likes you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Lily.
	You saved us all from that awkward moment by tripping on your own foot.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Kuma alert! Get back to the shelter!
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Lily and her opponent isn't over yet.
	Hey! The match is over!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Lily do?
	(Let her clean, but warn her not to cause any trouble.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	Well, you did get ''dirty'' by falling in the dirt.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Lily. What should you say?
	Well, you're as cute as Lily.
Lily is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Don't come over here! It's dangerous!
Latios is chatting with Lily after the match. Let's barge in.
	Don't you think about sneaking her out. She's our pretty girl.

Lina
Lina is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Lina is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Lina wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Lina is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Lina is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Lina is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Lina says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Lina seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Lina in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Lina is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Lina says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Lina says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Lina picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Lina is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Lina thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

You find Lina depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Lina is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Lina being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Lina is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Lina is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Lina is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Lina seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Lina who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Lina and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Lina looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Lina's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Lina seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Lina.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Lina and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Lina do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Lina. What should you say?
	Well, Lina does have that kind of charm.
Lina is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Lina after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Lindsey
Lindsey is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	Best of 4 should be our goal.

	I think that being able to understand each other is the most important.
Lindsey seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	It's within our grasp.
Lindsey is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	The honor of our opponent is also important.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	Be true to yourself.
Lindsey is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I'm sure you're going to become an intergalactic fool.
Lindsey is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	We must have faith in the Gate Keepers and win the Galaxy League.
Lindsey is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Are you giving up before putting up a fight?
Lindsey is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	This needs to be analyzed and fixed. Can you help me?
Lindsey is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	No, it's not boring.
It's before the 2nd half, and Lindsey is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	Don't give up until the end.
You forgot to lock Lindsey and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's my fault.
Lindsey is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	You deserve it. Well done!
Lindsey is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	I would've been doing something to save the universe.
The team is saying bad things about Lindsey for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Do you really think that she would skip practice?
Lindsey is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Lindsey seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	Let's go look for her.
On a day off, Lindsey is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	I'd love to have a stable job first.
Lindsey is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I just don't want to waste a single day in my life.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	Let's split up and find the uniforms.

Lindsey is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give her an answer.
	You. I know you're doing much for the team without taking any credit.
Lindsey is angry because she was criticized by her performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give her an answer.
	I want to practice with you, if that's okay with you. No?
Lindsey, who has shown absolutely superb chemistry with you, is embarrassed and says she didn't do all of that because of you. What should we say?
	Yeah? Well, I did what I did for you.
Lindsey wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?
	(Maybe she brought snacks but is too shy to share it with me.)
Lindsey looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
	Nervous? Trust me. I got you.
Lindsey seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to her.
	Should we join the club?
Lindsey is talking about how famous her rivals are in the Galaxy League. She seems jealous. Let's talk to her.
	I'll be your rival from now.
Lindsey is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
	Are you jealous?
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Lindsey on the head while teasing her, and then goes away. Lindsey seems angry...
	...I think you liked it more than you thought...
The team is at Metro City. Lindsey seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
	You have a heart of gold.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Lindsey seems confused.
	Two bears...Which one is Kuma?
Lindsey is spreading the happy news about her cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate her.
	So, the numerous baby clothes you've been making were all for this day?
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
	Huh? I think Lindsey is prettier.
Lindsey refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to her.
	Are you angry because I wasn't there to oversee your training? I said I'm sorry!
Lindsey is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?
	Be honest and show a sincere attitude.
Lindsey seems to be interested in the Micrinum from Kiri, which is said to be good for beauty and anti-aging. Let's talk to her.
	You're young and good looking even without that.
Lindsey seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give her some advice.
	That's the spirit! Let's teach them a lesson!
Lindsey looks sad because she feels her friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to her?
	Try starting off with some small talk.

	Your spirit is an inspiration to us all.

	Let's go visit her. Some fun won't do any harm. It might even cheer her up!

Litz

	Litz? Nah, she never gets lost.

	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.

	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)

	It's space. Anything can exist here.

	It's just a myth. Forget about it.

	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.

	Let's work up a solution.

	They support us from the shadows.

	Maybe if you increase your Strength...

	We'll see about it after the League.

	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!

	I guess he's happy this is a good match.

	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

	I think that being able to understand each other is the most important.
Lucius seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. He seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	It's within our grasp.
Lucius is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop him from causing any problems.
	The honor of our opponent is also important.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
	Be true to yourself.
Lucius is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I'm sure you're going to become an intergalactic fool.
Lucius is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
	We must have faith in the Gate Keepers and win the Galaxy League.
Lucius is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Are you giving up before putting up a fight?
Lucius is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	This needs to be analyzed and fixed. Can you help me?
Lucius is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
	No, it's not boring.
It's before the 2nd half, and Lucius is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	Don't give up until the end.
You forgot to lock Lucius and almost used him as training material! He looks very upset!
	It's my fault.
Lucius is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
	You deserve it. Well done!
