	I would've been doing something to save the universe.
The team is saying bad things about Lucius for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Do you really think that he would skip practice?
Lucius is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Lucius seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him. 
	Let's go look for him.
On a day off, Lucius is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	I'd love to have a stable job first.
Lucius is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I just don't want to waste a single day in my life.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	Let's split up and find the uniforms.

You find Lucius depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Lucius is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Lucius being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?
Lucius is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Lucius is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Lucius is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Lucius seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Lucius who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Lucius and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Lucius looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Lucius's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Lucius seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Lucius.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Lucius and his opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!

	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)

	They will never learn with an attitude like that.

	Well, Lucius does have that kind of charm.

	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Lucius after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Luka

	You'll have to compete with me!

	Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.

	Listen carefully and you'll find her.

	How about we ask Jeunese?

	Come on, I'll show you the best spots around!

Lukia
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Lukia asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Lukia suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Lukia is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Lukia has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Lukia said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Lukia. Lukia seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Lukia is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Lukia was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Lukia asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Lukia falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Lukia up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Lukia having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Lukia is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	The fans love your performance!
Lukia scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Lukia.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Lukia falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Lukia lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Lukia. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Lukia is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Lukia brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Lukia is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Lukia is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Lukia wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Lukia is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Lukia is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Lukia is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Lukia says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Lukia seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Lukia in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Lukia is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Lukia says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Lukia says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Lukia picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Lukia is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Lukia thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

	That's deep. I think it's cool.

	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.

	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.

	Please don't forget about the match.

	Is her name really Kiki?

	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.

	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?

	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?

	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)

	I have faith in you.

	Be honest and show a sincere attitude.

	You're young and good looking even without that.
Marilyn seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give her some advice.
	That's the spirit! Let's teach them a lesson!
Marilyn looks sad because she feels her friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to her?
	Try starting off with some small talk.
It's a tough match, but Marilyn is standing tall and encouraging the team. What should we say to her?
	Your spirit is an inspiration to us all.
A teammate that is a former member of the Dark Sisters is down sick, suffering from the aftermath of performing exorcism. Let's talk with Marilyn about what to do.
	Let's go visit her. Some fun won't do any harm. It might even cheer her up!

May
May is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	To win all the way, of course.
May is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
May seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
May is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
May is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	Cool! Keep it up!
May is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	It's silly of you to worry about such things. Are you feeling okay?
May is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	The door's over there.
May is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	It can't be perfect every time.
May is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and May is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.
You forgot to lock May and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's your fault.
May is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Nicely done! We're throwing a party today!
May is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about May for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.
May is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
May seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.
On a day off, May is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
May is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

May asks what you think is the most important ability in soccer. Give her an answer.
	Getting to know your opponents up to the point of falling in love with them...And then crushing them.
May is criticizing the male teammates that were mesmerized by Lilith during the match. It's your job to defend your teammates.
	This could all be avoided if we become mesmerized by you. Do as you please.
Being too excited, May is overreacting while talking about the game. It seems she wants people to agree with her.
	You're excited only because you got the chance to shoot the ball without any restraints against that player you like.
May is asking what it would be like to date an alien. Give her your opinion.
	I believe there was an old movie about an alien infiltrating a spaceship...
May seems to be planning to enter for the Galaxy League Mascot Contest. Let's talk to her.
	I mean...You may intimidate the crowd...But I guess that could be your charm?
May asks what your plans are for the holidays when there's no training or match. Give her an answer.
	(Stalk the person I secretly love to make sure she's not seeing anybody.)
May heard stories about the world of the demons and asks what you think it'll be like.
	I guess you can make friends even in a place like that.
May, who seems to be interested in Eve, is asking your opinion about her. What should we tell her?
	I'm worried that you two may go around causing trouble if you two are together.
Recently, May seems to enjoy chatting with Jin. She thinks Jin is funny. Let's talk with her.
	Oh how much I'd love to show you what his ''true'' form is like.
May is thinking about how to resist the psychological and mental attacks that the demons enjoy using. Let's give her advice.
	Maybe acting like a demon would help?
May is worried about Vermilion Bird. She thinks something is troubling Vermilion Bird.
	Maybe this is something about love and hate. It may be something serious.
May's uniform is all messed up because of the filthy plays of her opponent. What should we do?
	(Tell her that it's not the opponent showing affection and it's nothing but foul plays.)
A defender on the other team seems to have fallen in love with May and is chasing her around the field. It looks like the player forgot about the match. What should we do?
	That's like playing with fire.
Kaidormu of the United Explorers is praising May's plays. Let's add in.
	Be careful not to fall in love with her.
The team became furious after seeing May fall by the focused attack of the opposing team and used that fury to win the game. Let's say something.
	You can rely on your teammates in situations like this.
May is having trouble finding a Spirit Stone that fits her needs and taste. Let's give her advice.
	What about Silent Cold? You'll be able to hold on to your opponents.
May is asking about the whereabouts of a teammate that hasn't seen for quite a while. Let's give her an answer.
	You said you want to be with him...So I used him as material for your special training.
May is planning to go on a blind date with a close teammate. Should we say something to her?
	Come talk to me before you fall in love at first sight.
It seems that May is wondering what to do after a teammate proposed to her. It doesn't seem that she's not entirely uninterested. What should we do?
	It's not you to be kind to everybody. Just go and say no.
May is teasing her opponent that is having a hard time chasing her. What should we do?
	What are you going to do when that player falls in love with you?

Meg
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Meg is asking how she did in the match.
	You were picking the other team apart! It was awesome!
Meg looks excited as she's talking with the team about pets. She turns around and asks you what kind of pet you like.
	I like puppies. The loyal ones!
You come across Meg thinking about the value of soccer. What should we tell her?
	I feel something when I overpower my opponents on the field.
Meg is having trouble focusing on the match because of the affectionate emotion she feels. She says she must leave now to propose to her lover. What should we say?
	You don't need to be the one being dragged around.
Meg blushes up and tells you that she's happy she can play soccer with you. What should we tell her?
	*Smiles bitterly*
Meg is asking for special training sessions because she's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell her?
	Sure. Let's get on to it.
Meg did her best, but she failed to achieve the results she wanted and looks sad. We should say something to her.
	Sorry, I feel that this is on me.
Meg is asking you about what you like besides soccer.
	Rugby, a sport of strength!
Meg feels her heart races when she sees Littre.
	...That's not a rabbit.
Kuma is caught sneaking in the woman's locker room once again. We should talk with Meg about what to do with him.
	Let's make him put on Ogre's underwear.
Meg continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Guide her by kicking the ball toward the weak link in the opponent's defense.)
Meg is being annoying with her offensive words. What should we do?
	(Ignore it.)
It's dinner time and Meg is staring at her carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Eat it instead of her.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Meg to do?
	Wake them up. Kick them if you need to.
Meg says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	We shouldn't throw away food. Let's give it to somebody else.
Meg is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop her?
	(Step on the referee's foot and pretend it was an accident.)
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Meg running up ahead.
	(Let her steal your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Meg's shoe.
	(Tell Meg who did this.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Leave it to Meg.)
Meg hurt her leg during the 1st half of the match, but she insists on playing. What should we tell her?
	Okay. You make them pay, understand?

Meg says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Of course! Everybody is counting on you!
Meg asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I want to see everybody smile. I think that'll make me happy.
Meg is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	I'd like to keep one as a pet.
Meg looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Where do you think those comets are going?
Meg says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Yeah, I mean they could get hurt.
Meg wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	I'm planning to make a whole line of merchandise with them as the character.
Meg is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	Life is a light of its own.
Meg says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	Just hear them out and smile. They'll feel better.
Meg says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	I sense that there's something she hasn't told us yet...
Meg seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Congratulations! How did you guys get along?
Meg is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	You're playing soccer! You're fine!
Meg says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Tell her to be our lap cat.
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Meg seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you guys keep giving Meg trouble, I swear to god I'll use you both as special training material.
Meg is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	She seems like a nice girl.
Meg went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	Meg is in danger! We have to save her!
Meg claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	She must've made a mistake.

	We can do this! Let's go!

	Yeah, they get along pretty well.

	(A cute and pretty pendant)
Meg says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	I think she likes him.

Melchior
Melchior is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Melchior is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Melchior wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Melchior is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Melchior is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Melchior is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.

	He'll remember someday.

	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!

	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Melchior in the face!
	That must hurt.

	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Melchior is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Melchior says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Melchior says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Melchior picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Melchior is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Melchior thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Melchior says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	I'm sure that you're being a good influence to the team.
Melchior asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I guess I'll be chasing you on the road of glory.
Melchior is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	I think they're cute and elegant if you leave out the pig and bear. 
Melchior looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	The space has prepared this beautiful stage for you.
Melchior says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	They're young but they have passion.
Melchior wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Thankful beings that will be our +160.
Melchior is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	How about we make it to the top of the Galaxy League and shine the universe with the light within us?
Melchior says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	Tell them they should remember that they play for you.
Melchior says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	Did she think that you'll take over the throne?
Melchior seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Good for you! I know it's hard for you to find someone at your level!
Melchior is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	I don't think you need to worry about a diet.
Melchior says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Ask her if she likes you and if she wants to join our team.
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Melchior seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	You both need to be disciplined by Melchior.
Melchior is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	You seem like the princess...Scratch that, the queen.
Melchior went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	I feel sorry for the other team.
Melchior claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	I don't care what the case is.
Melchior seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Be careful not to be stomped on...
Melchior says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	That's strange. I thought he was more of an authoritative character.

	(A chocker with a pretty radical design.)
Melchior says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	That's a mixture of mockery, sympathy, and love.

Metatron
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Metatron asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	What, are you expecting something like ''I feel like I can fly'' or something?
Metatron suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How could you think about eating at a time like this? I'm disappointed in you.
Metatron is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Just nod your head.)
Metatron has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
As Metatron said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.
The crowd is cheering for Metatron. Metatron seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	How about just accepting the compliments for today?
Metatron is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.
Metatron was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!
The team will not have a match for some time. Metatron asks you about your plan.
	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Metatron falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Metatron up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Metatron having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Metatron is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Metatron scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Metatron.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Metatron falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Metatron lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Metatron. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Metatron is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Metatron brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

Metatron is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Metatron, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Metatron announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Metatron is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Metatron wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Metatron is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Metatron? Nah, she never gets lost.
You find Metatron lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Metatron says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Metatron wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Metatron caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Metatron some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Metatron seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Metatron came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Metatron is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Metatron seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Metatron looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Metatron to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

You come across Metatron, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	Those scumbags played dirty. Ugh, I'm angry!
Metatron is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	I'm not comfortable with this conversation.
Metatron, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	To bring justice with soccer. That's all.
Metatron says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	Let's do our best until the very end!
You're having a conversation with Metatron about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I won't rely on Spirit Stones.
Metatron is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	I like what you just said.
Let's talk to Metatron who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	It's a place to rest for the good.
Metatron is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	It's something I'd want to see again with a person I care.
The teammates are speaking highly of Metatron, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She's truly a role model to us all with her skills and attitude.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I feel sorry, but that's irrelevant to the match.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Metatron wants to say a word.
	Come on guys, you know it's an exciting thing to be playing against a strong team! Keep your heads up high!
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	So, there are no real illegal matches. I guess I'm relieved.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	We will confront them fair and square, and win.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	Would she be happy if she finds out you're doing this?
Metatron points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	That's too convenient to be a coincidence.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Metatron seems to be surprised.
	Well, what do you know! They have some decency in them after all.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Metatron is asking for help.
	I hope the demon didn't say anything stupid.
Cracsus threatens to hack Metatron's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	Don't fall for this cheap shot.
Metatron is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	Then we should do our very best to win.
Metatron is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	I don't like the word oblivion.

	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Mikel is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Mikel says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Mikel says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Mikel picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Mikel is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Mikel thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

You find Mikel depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Mikel is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Mikel being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Mikel is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Mikel is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Mikel is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Mikel seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Mikel who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Mikel and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Mikel looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Mikel's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Mikel seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Mikel.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Mikel and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Mikel do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Mikel. What should you say?
	Well, Mikel does have that kind of charm.
Mikel is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Mikel after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Milky Way
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Milky Way asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Milky Way suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Milky Way is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Pat her on the head.)
Milky Way has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Milky Way said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Milky Way. Milky Way seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Milky Way is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I am so thankful to them.
Milky Way was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Milky Way asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Milky Way falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Milky Way up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Milky Way having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Milky Way is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Milky Way scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Milky Way.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Milky Way falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Milky Way lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give her some heals?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Milky Way. Let's talk to her.
	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Milky Way is curious and wants to take a look.
	They must love volunteer work!
Milky Way brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

You find Milky Way depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	It's not your fault that you fell during the match. Don't worry about it!
Milky Way is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be all negative because there were some mistakes. You're a precious part of this team.
You come across Milky Way being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Don't use that ability on the field...
Milky Way is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	Stay by my side and make sure I don't make any mistakes, will you?
Milky Way is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	I'll sleep by your side tonight.
Milky Way is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	It's not your fault. It's your mistakes that took the opponents off guard.
Milky Way seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	Perfect! No mistakes made!
You come across Milky Way who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	I think I'll get injured too if you're on the field. Please sit on the bench.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Ramen, that's a dangerous food to cook.
You're watching the storm with Milky Way and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	She shines even in the darkest storms! How gorgeous!
Milky Way looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Did you prepare your meds in case you get space-sick? Never mind, I'll prepare the meds.
Milky Way's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Milky Way seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	I think that player likes you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Milky Way.
	You saved us all from that awkward moment by tripping on your own foot.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Kuma alert! Get back to the shelter!
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Milky Way and her opponent isn't over yet.
	Hey! The match is over!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Milky Way do?
	(Let her clean, but warn her not to cause any trouble.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	Well, you did get ''dirty'' by falling in the dirt.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Milky Way. What should you say?
	Well, you're as cute as Milky Way.

	Don't come over here! It's dangerous!
Latios is chatting with Milky Way after the match. Let's barge in.
	Don't you think about sneaking her out. She's our pretty girl.

	It didn't portray your awesome performance.

	I'll try to have the ball come your way.

	They're on cooldown.

	I'm thinking of opening a shop.

	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.

With a serious face, Mireille is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	A way that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Mireille came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Just please go with that boring strategy.
Mireille is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Mireille is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Mireille seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Mireille seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Mireille is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Mireille is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Mireille plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Mireille and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Mireille seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Mireille's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Mireille bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Mireille is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Mireille is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Mireille is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

Momo
You find Momo depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	Don't mind it. It's our fault. We weren't able to make use of your strength.
Momo is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be anxious. Have faith and keep following me.
You come across Momo being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Don't worry, I'll go with you.
Momo is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I'm afraid to be honest.
Momo is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	I see. We must be careful. I'll be watching over you.
Momo is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	Let's solve the problems one by one.
Momo seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	It's thanks to you! Thanks for listening to my instructions!
You come across Momo who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Trust me and your teammates. Sit this one out.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Is Marilyn your mother or nanny?
You're watching the storm with Momo and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	Is something troubling her? I'm having a bad feeling.
Momo looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Don't worry. Leave it up to me.
Momo's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Momo seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	You're doing fine. Don't play your opponent's game.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Momo.
	I think he felt better because of the positive energy you always have around you.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's ignore them and get ready for the match.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Momo and her opponent isn't over yet.
	I've never seen her worked up that much.
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Momo do?
	(Give her instructions so that she can do her share of the cleaning quickly.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	We didn't play dirty, right?
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Momo. What should you say?
	I hope you two become good rivals.
Momo is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Don't worry about me! Do your job!
Latios is chatting with Momo after the match. Let's barge in.
	Momo was fantastic on the field, right?

Momo is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's a result of team effort.
After a meeting, Momo's eyes met yours a several times and Momo asks if she has something on her face.
	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.
With a serious look on her face, Momo warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	Bathroom...It is indeed a very important matter...
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Momo on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	I can't pick just one...
Momo is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
	Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Momo is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
	I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
Momo is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
	Every teammate there by my side on the field is special.
You find Momo being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Now we're starting to look like a team!
Momo is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
	I'll teach you how to meditate to synchronize the breathing with other teammates.
Momo is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
Momo doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
It's Momo's birthday. Let's give her a present.
	Here! I made some cookies with the team.
You see Momo's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Momo. What should we do?
	Let's see how long they last. Come on guys!
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Momo's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to her?
	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?
Momo comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	There will always be a place for you to return.
Momo is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Momo.
	We can overcome this with team effort.
Momo is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Momo seems to be interested.
	We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
Momo says she wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots she makes.
	I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.

Morgana
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Morgana is asking how she did in the match.
	You bring the best out of the team. Good work!

	The field is a ground of hopes and dreams. Isn't that enough?

	If that's your wish.

	It's experiences like this that bonds us together.

	I like board games about war. I admire famous commanders.

	...Do you want a Superb Power-up?

	I'm not sure if it's safe, but we can use him for leveling up.
Morgana continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Make a strategic decision.)
Morgana is being annoying with her offensive words. What should we do?
	(Kick her out of the team if things can't be handled.)
It's dinner time and Morgana is staring at her carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Tell her that carrots are good for the body and to eat it all.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Morgana to do?
	They all need scolding.
Morgana says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	Let's stay away from the soup, just in case.
Morgana is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop her?
	Ignore the referee. Focus on the match.
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Morgana running up ahead.
	(Catch up and share your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Morgana's shoe.
	(Remove the tack and tell the manager on the other team.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Wake the player up and continue with the meeting.)
Morgana hurt her leg during the 1st half of the match, but she insists on playing. What should we tell her?
	Don't push yourself too hard. There are a lot of matches left.

You come across Morgana, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	Those scumbags played dirty. Ugh, I'm angry!
Morgana is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	I'm not comfortable with this conversation.
Morgana, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	To bring justice with soccer. That's all.
Morgana says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	Let's do our best until the very end!
You're having a conversation with Morgana about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I won't rely on Spirit Stones.
Morgana is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	I like what you just said.
Let's talk to Morgana who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	It's a place to rest for the good.
Morgana is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	It's something I'd want to see again with a person I care.
The teammates are speaking highly of Morgana, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She's truly a role model to us all with her skills and attitude.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I feel sorry, but that's irrelevant to the match.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Morgana wants to say a word.
	Come on guys, you know it's an exciting thing to be playing against a strong team! Keep your heads up high!
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	So, there are no real illegal matches. I guess I'm relieved.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	We will confront them fair and square, and win.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	Would she be happy if she finds out you're doing this?
Morgana points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	That's too convenient to be a coincidence.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Morgana seems to be surprised.
	Well, what do you know! They have some decency in them after all.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Morgana is asking for help.
	I hope the demon didn't say anything stupid.
Cracsus threatens to hack Morgana's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	Don't fall for this cheap shot.
Morgana is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	Then we should do our very best to win.
Morgana is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	I don't like the word oblivion.

You come across Muriel who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	I think I'll get injured too if you're on the field. Please sit on the bench.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Ramen, that's a dangerous food to cook.
You're watching the storm with Muriel and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	She shines even in the darkest storms! How gorgeous!
Muriel looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Did you prepare your meds in case you get space-sick? Never mind, I'll prepare the meds.
Muriel's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Muriel seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	I think that player likes you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Muriel.
	You saved us all from that awkward moment by tripping on your own foot.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Kuma alert! Get back to the shelter!
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Muriel and her opponent isn't over yet.
	Hey! The match is over!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Muriel do?
	(Let her clean, but warn her not to cause any trouble.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	Well, you did get ''dirty'' by falling in the dirt.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Muriel. What should you say?
	Well, you're as cute as Muriel.
Muriel is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Don't come over here! It's dangerous!
Latios is chatting with Muriel after the match. Let's barge in.
	Don't you think about sneaking her out. She's our pretty girl.

Muspel
Muspel is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to him.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Muspel is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help him?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Muspel wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Muspel is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became his life. Let's talk with him.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Muspel is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give him an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Muspel is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Muspel says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Muspel seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Muspel in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Muspel is suddenly showing massive improvement in his performance. He must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Muspel says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Muspel says he forgot to use his skill points before entering the match. What should we say to him?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Muspel picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Muspel is irritated because his opponent has the attribute advantage over him.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Muspel thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Muspel says he's the center of the team and asks if you agree with him. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Muspel asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give him a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Muspel is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Muspel looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to him?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Muspel says he's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give him an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Muspel wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give him an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Muspel is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to him.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Muspel says he was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Muspel says that Bell seemed depressed when he told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Muspel seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell him?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Muspel is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Muspel says he's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Muspel seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Muspel is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Muspel went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of him when he comes back.
Muspel claims he saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Muspel seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Muspel says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Muspel hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Muspel says that he thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give him an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.
