Nebra blushes up and tells you that he's happy he can play soccer with you. What should we tell him?
	*Smiles bitterly*
Nebra is asking for special training sessions because he's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell him?
	Sure. Let's get on to it.
Nebra did his best, but he failed to achieve the results he wanted and looks sad. We should say something to him.
	Sorry, I feel that this is on me.
Nebra is asking you about what you like besides soccer.
	Rugby, a sport of strength!
Nebra feels his heart races when he sees Littre.
	...That's not a rabbit.
Kuma is caught sneaking in the woman's locker room once again. We should talk with Nebra about what to do with him.
	Let's make him put on Ogre's underwear.
Nebra continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Guide him by kicking the ball toward the weak link in the opponent's defense.)
Nebra is being annoying with his offensive words. What should we do?
	(Ignore it.)
It's dinner time and Nebra is staring at his carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Eat it instead of him.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Nebra to do?
	Wake them up. Kick them if you need to.
Nebra says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	We shouldn't throw away food. Let's give it to somebody else.
Nebra is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop him?
	(Step on the referee's foot and pretend it was an accident.)
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Nebra running up ahead.
	(Let him steal your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Nebra's shoe.
	(Tell Nebra who did this.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Leave it to Nebra.)
Nebra hurt his leg during the 1st half of the match, but he insists on playing. What should we tell him?
	Okay. You make them pay, understand?

Nebra says he's the center of the team and asks if you agree with him. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Nebra asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give him a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Nebra is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Nebra looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to him?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Nebra says he's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give him an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Nebra wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give him an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Nebra is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to him.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Nebra says he was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Nebra says that Bell seemed depressed when he told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Nebra seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell him?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Nebra is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Nebra says he's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Nebra seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Nebra is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Nebra went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of him when he comes back.
Nebra claims he saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Nebra seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Nebra says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Nebra hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Nebra says that he thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give him an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Neraizel
Neraizel is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Neraizel is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Neraizel wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Neraizel is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Neraizel is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Neraizel is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Neraizel says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Neraizel seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Neraizel in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Neraizel is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Neraizel says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Neraizel says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Neraizel picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Neraizel is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Neraizel thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

You come across Neraizel, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.
Neraizel is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.
Neraizel, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	Just playing soccer, that's all.
Neraizel says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.
You're having a conversation with Neraizel about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I need a Spirit Stone that's as fancy as I am.
Neraizel is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!
Let's talk to Neraizel who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	I hope it's not a boring place.
Neraizel is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	Let's not talk about anything irrelevant to the match.
The teammates are speaking highly of Neraizel, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She shows dominance with elegance.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I'm considering making an anonymous donation.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Neraizel wants to say a word.
	Get yourselves together, guys. Are you going to give up already?
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	It's sort of an obligation for first class athletes like me to mingle with the community.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Neraizel points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Neraizel seems to be surprised.
	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Neraizel is asking for help.
	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.
Cracsus threatens to hack Neraizel's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	I contacted Hildegard.
Neraizel is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Neraizel is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

Nerua
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Nerua asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Nerua suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Nerua is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Pat her on the head.)
Nerua has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Nerua said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Nerua. Nerua seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Nerua is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I am so thankful to them.
Nerua was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Nerua asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Nerua falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Nerua up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Nerua having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Nerua is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Nerua scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Nerua.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Nerua falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Nerua lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give her some heals?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Nerua. Let's talk to her.
	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Nerua is curious and wants to take a look.
	They must love volunteer work!
Nerua brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

Nerua is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	They were a worthy opponent.
This was the worst game in your entire life...Nerua comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks. You always know how to get me back on my feet.
You're talking to Nerua about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
	I would say goodbye to all my friends.
Nerua is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
	I'm sure everybody is feeling the same way you feel.
Nerua is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
	Let's make that our goal and make it happen.
Nerua isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	Let's all talk together and figure out what the problem is.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Nerua for solutions.
	I guess it's time the benchwarmers get a chance.
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	Let's ask for help to the League officials on this planet.
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Nerua and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	Let's give her some space.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	This proves that even the aliens like Nari.
According to Nerua's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	I thought they were just friends.
Nerua thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	First, let's look for a way to bring him back to normal. 
Nerua won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	Hmm, come back to me with a vacation plan.
Nerua suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	That would be wonderful! I'll go ask for permission.
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Let's see what you have to say after the match.
You're sick and in bed when Nerua and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	I'm sorry...I should be giving you guys some tea or something, but...
The match and the concert that Nerua was looking for start at the same time...
	I'm sorry that you couldn't go.
Nerua wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Long ago, he was disgraceful towards a dragon emissary.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Excuse me, but do you have an appointment with that cat?
The match started and Nerua is standing still doing nothing.
	Looks like we'll have to do without her.

Net
Net is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell him?
	To win all the way, of course.
Net is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
Net seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. He seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
Net is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop him from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
Net is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	Cool! Keep it up!
Net is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
	It's silly of you to worry about such things. Are you feeling okay?
Net is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	The door's over there.

	It can't be perfect every time.

	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and Net is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.

	It's your fault.
Net is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
	Nicely done! We're throwing a party today!
Net is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Net for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	His love towards soccer is real.
Net is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
Net seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.

	If you find a beautiful woman, try talking to her!
Net is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

You find Net depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Net is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Net being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?
Net is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Net is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Net is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Net seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Net who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Net and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Net looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Net's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Net seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Net.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Net and his opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Net do?
	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Net. What should you say?
	Well, Net does have that kind of charm.
Net is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Net after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

	It's not your fault that you fell during the match. Don't worry about it!
Nia is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be all negative because there were some mistakes. You're a precious part of this team.
You come across Nia being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Don't use that ability on the field...
Nia is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	Stay by my side and make sure I don't make any mistakes, will you?
Nia is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	I'll sleep by your side tonight.
Nia is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	It's not your fault. It's your mistakes that took the opponents off guard.
Nia seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	Perfect! No mistakes made!
You come across Nia who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	I think I'll get injured too if you're on the field. Please sit on the bench.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Ramen, that's a dangerous food to cook.
You're watching the storm with Nia and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	She shines even in the darkest storms! How gorgeous!
Nia looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Did you prepare your meds in case you get space-sick? Never mind, I'll prepare the meds.
Nia's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Nia seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	I think that player likes you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Nia.
	You saved us all from that awkward moment by tripping on your own foot.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Kuma alert! Get back to the shelter!
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Nia and her opponent isn't over yet.
	Hey! The match is over!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Nia do?
	(Let her clean, but warn her not to cause any trouble.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	Well, you did get ''dirty'' by falling in the dirt.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Nia. What should you say?
	Well, you're as cute as Nia.
Nia is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Don't come over here! It's dangerous!
Latios is chatting with Nia after the match. Let's barge in.
	Don't you think about sneaking her out. She's our pretty girl.

Niarose
You find Niarose depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.

	That's why I need your help.

	I was always looking forward for that moment.

	It's just a dream. Forget about it.

	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?

	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Niarose and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!

	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)

	They will never learn with an attitude like that.

	Can you peel this guy off of me?

	I'm looking forward to our next match!

	It's just a myth. Forget about it.

	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.

	Let's work up a solution.

	They support us from the shadows.
The team is having a good run and Niarose is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.

	The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.

	Maybe if you increase your Strength...

	Flawless skills.

	It's surprising to see such advanced technology.

	We'll see about it after the League.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Niarose and talk about what to do.
	Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.

	I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.

	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!

	I guess he's happy this is a good match.

	If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.

	We have to keep on going.

	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.

	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.

	All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Niarose is starting to get intimidated.
	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

Nikita
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Nikita asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	What, are you expecting something like ''I feel like I can fly'' or something?
Nikita suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How could you think about eating at a time like this? I'm disappointed in you.
Nikita is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Just nod your head.)
Nikita has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
As Nikita said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.

	How about just accepting the compliments for today?

	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.

	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!
The team will not have a match for some time. Nikita asks you about your plan.
	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Nikita falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Nikita up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Nikita having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Nikita is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Nikita scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Nikita.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Nikita falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Nikita lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Nikita. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Nikita is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Nikita brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

Nikita is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	It's all because nobody on this team cares about strategy! This is nonsense!
Nikita is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's stressful because we can't prepare for extraterrestrial sanitation. We're completely exposed to all those unknown...things.
Nikita wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Perfect planning and perfect execution.
Nikita is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Life, eh? I guess that's a bit too serious for me, but I think I understand how you feel.
Nikita is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	How about some presents for your parents?
Nikita is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My teammates and their flawless play!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	I heard that the bath products on Earth are the best in the universe.
Nikita says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	That's bad. I'm sure it's something important!
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	I can't stand this...I need to end this quickly and go take a shower.
Nikita seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	The eyepatch...I wonder if she washes it. She seems to have it on at all times.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Nikita in the face!
	Ugh...Gross...
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	I could throw the ball and continue the match, but my honor wouldn't allow that.
Nikita is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	You've become better. Now you need to focus on staying that way.
Nikita says that the Swirlies are missing.
	I evolved them.
Nikita says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	That's unacceptable!

	Ugh...I want to dig my eyes out.
Nikita picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Let's contact her and return this.
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	Well, now what?

	Do I have to stop the match?
Nikita thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Hmm, her tail is a bit weird and her ears are definitely human...

	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!

	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.

	That must hurt.

	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!

	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.

	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...

	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...

	A crow?!

	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.

	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

	They were a worthy opponent.

	Thanks. You always know how to get me back on my feet.

	I would say goodbye to all my friends.

	I guess it's time the benchwarmers get a chance.

	I thought they were just friends.

	Care to receive the ball with your face?

	Stop right there!

	Run! Just start running!

	Wreck the other team.

	It was an intense feeling as if I was going against the strongest team in the universe.

	I feel bad for the players that have to face you.

	Stop whining. I like it better when you're arrogant and sarcastic.

	I'm surprised you care so much for your friends.

	Hmm, I guess you're more domestic than I thought.

	Sounds like a more boring place than Cruzentes.

	This team is a mess. Gather everybody on the field. I'll knock that spirit back into you guys if I have to.

	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Pei Lin has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Pei Lin said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Pei Lin. Pei Lin seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Pei Lin is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Pei Lin was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Pei Lin asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Pei Lin falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Pei Lin up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Pei Lin having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Pei Lin is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	The fans love your performance!
Pei Lin scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Pei Lin.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Pei Lin falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Pei Lin lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Pei Lin. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Pei Lin is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Pei Lin brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Phil
Phil is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell him?
	Teamwork is what matters the most.

	Passes that you prefer aren't always the right answer.
Phil is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
	If you're up for suggestions, I'm all ears.

	We should at least put up a fight so they remember us.

	It was all just to motivate you to become a better player!

	Aren't you satisfied with your performance?

	I would've tried to find something that fits me.
The team is saying bad things about Phil for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Skipping practice isn't something that's in his dictionary.

	Hmm...If only I could change the shape of the horns and the color of the scales. That'd be perfect.

	Everybody should grow up.

	It's really hard to find the right person.

	(I want my dreams to come true.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	What's done is done. Let's come up with a new design.

	You did well and I thank you for that.
Phil is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Phil being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?

	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Phil is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Phil is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Phil seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Phil who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.

	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?

	What's wrong with her?

	Littre will be fine.

	That player is just messing with you.

	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?

	Let's give them a hand.

	You better win that fight!

	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)

	They will never learn with an attitude like that.

	Well, Phil does have that kind of charm.

	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Phil after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

	We'll find the ones that did this and use them as fertilizers.

	Iron Claw!

	Sounds like a more boring place than Cruzentes.

	This team is a mess. Gather everybody on the field. I'll knock that spirit back into you guys if I have to.

Rasiel is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Rasiel looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Rasiel says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Rasiel wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Rasiel is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Rasiel says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Rasiel says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Rasiel seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Rasiel is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Rasiel says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Rasiel seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Rasiel is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Rasiel went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of her when she comes back.
Rasiel claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Rasiel seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Rasiel says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Rasiel hands you a present.
	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Rasiel says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Ravi
Ravi is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	Teamwork is what matters the most.
Ravi is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I have very specific standards for personality, looks, values, and background. Are you interested in hearing about it?
Ravi seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	I would like to hear what you think is the best team in the universe.
Ravi is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	That team is far from your style.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	Is winning really worth going that far?
Ravi is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	I..Respect your naming taste...
Ravi is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	A mysterious villain...Bad taste, if you ask me.
Ravi is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	Vicious? More like ugly.
Ravi is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	Passes that you prefer aren't always the right answer.
Ravi is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	If you're up for suggestions, I'm all ears.
It's before the 2nd half, and Ravi is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	We should at least put up a fight so they remember us.
You forgot to lock Ravi and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It was all just to motivate you to become a better player!
Ravi is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Aren't you satisfied with your performance?
Ravi is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	I would've tried to find something that fits me.
The team is saying bad things about Ravi for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Skipping practice isn't something that's in her dictionary.
Ravi is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	Hmm...If only I could change the shape of the horns and the color of the scales. That'd be perfect.
Ravi seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	Everybody should grow up.
On a day off, Ravi is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	It's really hard to find the right person.
Ravi is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want my dreams to come true.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	What's done is done. Let's come up with a new design.

Ravi is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Ravi, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Ravi announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Ravi is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Ravi wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Ravi is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Ravi? Nah, she never gets lost.
You find Ravi lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Ravi says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Ravi wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Ravi caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Ravi some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Ravi seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Ravi came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Ravi is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Ravi seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Ravi looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Ravi to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Ravian
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Ravian asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	What, are you expecting something like ''I feel like I can fly'' or something?
Ravian suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How could you think about eating at a time like this? I'm disappointed in you.
Ravian is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Just nod your head.)
Ravian has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
As Ravian said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.
The crowd is cheering for Ravian. Ravian seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	How about just accepting the compliments for today?
Ravian is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.
Ravian was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!
The team will not have a match for some time. Ravian asks you about your plan.
	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Ravian falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Ravian up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Ravian having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Ravian is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Ravian scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Ravian.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Ravian falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Ravian lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...

	(Ignore.)

	Throw it away. NOW.

	Being together is enough for me.

The team is having a good run and Ravian is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	Let's keep this momentum going!
Ravian seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Ravian seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Don't be weak.
Ravian is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Ravian is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Ravian plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Ravian and talk about what to do.
	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
Ravian seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great.

	...Uh...So no soccer?

	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!

	That player must have a heart of gold.

	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.

Robin says he wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots he makes.
	Let's come up with a new strategy to give you more synergy.

Robin is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	I led our team to victory with wedgies!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Robin comes to you to cheer you up.
	Please explain why you kicked the ball into our goal post, will you?
You're talking to Robin about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell him your answer.
	If it's the end of the world, I'd pull of a crazy performance in a densely populated area before I go!
Robin is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to him.
	Aren't you the one everybody should be afraid of?
Robin is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give him some advice.
	I hope you get scouted by an interesting team.
Robin isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. He feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	Let's invest some Crystals and get new players!
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Robin for solutions.
	How about we put that advanced technology of Metro City to use?
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We could start a reset marathon.
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Robin and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	I could really use some grilled sweet potatoes and chestnuts.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	I think she's something more than just an idol.
According to Robin's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	I want to see Tyler's true characteristics.
Robin thinks he knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	Of course we should tell Lynbell! What are you waiting for?
Robin won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	...World? What about space? Isn't that more interesting?
Robin suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	What's the agenda here? Are you trying to taint the pure angels?
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	I didn't know I was a talented foot volleyball player!
You're sick and in bed when Robin and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	Get closer so I can spread my germs!
The match and the concert that Robin was looking for start at the same time...
	Let's hack the big screen so we can see the concert!
Robin wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	The character story left him a trauma.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	...Maybe he just likes cats!
The match started and Robin is standing still doing nothing.
	What is he doing? Is he a totem?

Roina
Roina is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give her an answer.
	You. I know you're doing much for the team without taking any credit.
Roina is angry because she was criticized by her performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give her an answer.
	I want to practice with you, if that's okay with you. No?
Roina, who has shown absolutely superb chemistry with you, is embarrassed and says she didn't do all of that because of you. What should we say?
	Yeah? Well, I did what I did for you.
Roina wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?
	(Maybe she brought snacks but is too shy to share it with me.)
Roina looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
	Nervous? Trust me. I got you.
Roina seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to her.
	Should we join the club?
Roina is talking about how famous her rivals are in the Galaxy League. She seems jealous. Let's talk to her.
	I'll be your rival from now.
Roina is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
	Are you jealous?
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Roina on the head while teasing her, and then goes away. Roina seems angry...
	...I think you liked it more than you thought...
The team is at Metro City. Roina seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
	You have a heart of gold.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Roina seems confused.
	Two bears...Which one is Kuma?
Roina is spreading the happy news about her cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate her.
	So, the numerous baby clothes you've been making were all for this day?
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
	Huh? I think Roina is prettier.
Roina refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to her.
	Are you angry because I wasn't there to oversee your training? I said I'm sorry!
Roina is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?
	Be honest and show a sincere attitude.
Roina seems to be interested in the Micrinum from Kiri, which is said to be good for beauty and anti-aging. Let's talk to her.
	You're young and good looking even without that.
Roina seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give her some advice.
	That's the spirit! Let's teach them a lesson!
Roina looks sad because she feels her friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to her?
	Try starting off with some small talk.
It's a tough match, but Roina is standing tall and encouraging the team. What should we say to her?
	Your spirit is an inspiration to us all.
A teammate that is a former member of the Dark Sisters is down sick, suffering from the aftermath of performing exorcism. Let's talk with Roina about what to do.
	Let's go visit her. Some fun won't do any harm. It might even cheer her up!

Roina is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's a result of team effort.
After a meeting, Roina's eyes met yours a several times and Roina asks if she has something on her face.
	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.
With a serious look on her face, Roina warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	Bathroom...It is indeed a very important matter...
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Roina on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	I can't pick just one...
Roina is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
	Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Roina is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
	I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
Roina is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
	Every teammate there by my side on the field is special.
You find Roina being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Now we're starting to look like a team!
Roina is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
	I'll teach you how to meditate to synchronize the breathing with other teammates.
Roina is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
Roina doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
It's Roina's birthday. Let's give her a present.
	Here! I made some cookies with the team.
You see Roina's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Roina. What should we do?
	Let's see how long they last. Come on guys!
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Roina's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to her?
	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?
Roina comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	There will always be a place for you to return.
Roina is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Roina.
	We can overcome this with team effort.
Roina is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Roina seems to be interested.
	We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
Roina says she wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots she makes.
	I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.

Ronald
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Ronald asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Ronald suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Ronald is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Pat him on the head.)
Ronald has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Ronald said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Ronald. Ronald seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Ronald is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I am so thankful to them.
Ronald was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Ronald asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Ronald falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Ronald up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Ronald having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Ronald is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Ronald scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Ronald.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Ronald falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Ronald lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give him some heals?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Ronald. Let's talk to her.
	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Ronald is curious and wants to take a look.
	They must love volunteer work!
Ronald brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

Ronald is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	The other team went home crying!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Ronald comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
You're talking to Ronald about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell him your answer.
	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.
Ronald is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to him.
	It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
Ronald is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give him some advice.
	Make the scouters fall in love with your performance!
Ronald isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. He feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Ronald for solutions.
	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this. 
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Ronald and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	There's no time for tears! Find out who did this and bring justice!
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
According to Ronald's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	William doesn't know how to respect his seniors.
Ronald thinks he knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	...Sometimes, the truth is better to be left a secret.
Ronald won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	What about soccer? You'll have to go through me to go on that trip!
Ronald suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Care to receive the ball with your face?
You're sick and in bed when Ronald and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	You guys...I'm about to cry...
The match and the concert that Ronald was looking for start at the same time...
	Channel that sorrow and rage towards your opponents and make them pay.
Ronald wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Stop right there!
The match started and Ronald is standing still doing nothing.
	Run! Just start running!

Rosaria
Rosaria is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	To win all the way, of course.
Rosaria is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
Rosaria seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
Rosaria is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
Rosaria is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	Cool! Keep it up!
Rosaria is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	It's silly of you to worry about such things. Are you feeling okay?
Rosaria is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	The door's over there.
Rosaria is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	It can't be perfect every time.
Rosaria is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and Rosaria is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.
You forgot to lock Rosaria and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's your fault.
Rosaria is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Nicely done! We're throwing a party today!
Rosaria is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Rosaria for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.
Rosaria is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
Rosaria seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.
On a day off, Rosaria is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
Rosaria is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

Rosaria seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	They say the fortune-telling is inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
With a serious face, Rosaria is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	A way that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Rosaria came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Just please go with that boring strategy.
Rosaria is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Rosaria is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Rosaria seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Rosaria seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Rosaria is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Rosaria is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Rosaria plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Rosaria and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Rosaria seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Rosaria's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Rosaria bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Rosaria is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Rosaria is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Rosaria is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

	Rugby, a sport of strength!

	...That's not a rabbit.

	Let's make him put on Ogre's underwear.

	(Guide her by kicking the ball toward the weak link in the opponent's defense.)
Rosette is being annoying with her offensive words. What should we do?
	(Ignore it.)
It's dinner time and Rosette is staring at her carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Eat it instead of her.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Rosette to do?
	Wake them up. Kick them if you need to.
Rosette says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	We shouldn't throw away food. Let's give it to somebody else.
Rosette is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop her?
	(Step on the referee's foot and pretend it was an accident.)
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Rosette running up ahead.
	(Let her steal your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Rosette's shoe.
	(Tell Rosette who did this.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Leave it to Rosette.)
Rosette hurt her leg during the 1st half of the match, but she insists on playing. What should we tell her?
	Okay. You make them pay, understand?
