	Let's ask for help to the League officials on this planet.
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Rudiel and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	Let's give her some space.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	This proves that even the aliens like Nari.
According to Rudiel's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	I thought they were just friends.
Rudiel thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	First, let's look for a way to bring him back to normal. 
Rudiel won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	Hmm, come back to me with a vacation plan.
Rudiel suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	That would be wonderful! I'll go ask for permission.
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Let's see what you have to say after the match.
You're sick and in bed when Rudiel and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	I'm sorry...I should be giving you guys some tea or something, but...
The match and the concert that Rudiel was looking for start at the same time...
	I'm sorry that you couldn't go.
Rudiel wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Long ago, he was disgraceful towards a dragon emissary.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Excuse me, but do you have an appointment with that cat?
The match started and Rudiel is standing still doing nothing.
	Looks like we'll have to do without her.

Rudy
Rudy is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	To win all the way, of course.
Rudy is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
Rudy seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
Rudy is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
Rudy is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	Cool! Keep it up!
Rudy is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	It's silly of you to worry about such things. Are you feeling okay?
Rudy is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	The door's over there.
Rudy is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	It can't be perfect every time.
Rudy is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and Rudy is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.
You forgot to lock Rudy and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's your fault.
Rudy is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Nicely done! We're throwing a party today!
Rudy is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Rudy for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.
Rudy is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
Rudy seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.
On a day off, Rudy is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
Rudy is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

Rudy says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Well, your sarcastic jokes are an essential part of the team's strength.
Rudy asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!
Rudy is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Rudy looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?
Rudy says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Rudy wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Rudy is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Rudy says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Rudy says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Rudy seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Rudy is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Rudy says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Rudy seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Rudy is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Rudy went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of her when she comes back.

	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?

	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Rudy says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.

	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)

	Maybe she's up to something.

Sam is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Sam has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Sam said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Sam. Sam seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Sam is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Sam was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Sam asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Sam falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Sam up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Sam having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Sam is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	The fans love your performance!
Sam scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Sam.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Sam falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Sam lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Sam. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Sam is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Sam brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

You find Sam depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Sam is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Sam being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?
Sam is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Sam is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Sam is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Sam seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Sam who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Sam and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Sam looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Sam's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Sam seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Sam.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Sam and his opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Sam do?
	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Sam. What should you say?
	Well, Sam does have that kind of charm.
Sam is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Sam after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Sam is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
	It's a result of team effort.
After a meeting, Sam's eyes met yours a several times and Sam asks if he has something on his face.
	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.
With a serious look on his face, Sam warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
	Bathroom...It is indeed a very important matter...
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Sam on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
	I can't pick just one...
Sam is worried that he has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell him?
	Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Sam is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to him.
	I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
Sam is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give him an answer.
	Every teammate there by my side on the field is special.
You find Sam being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
	Now we're starting to look like a team!
Sam is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help him out.
	I'll teach you how to meditate to synchronize the breathing with other teammates.
Sam is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
	I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
Sam doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
	It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
It's Sam's birthday. Let's give him a present.
	Here! I made some cookies with the team.
You see Sam's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Sam. What should we do?
	Let's see how long they last. Come on guys!
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
You hear that the opponent team's ace, who is also Sam's rival, has been severely injured and is in the hospital. What should you say to him?
	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?
Sam comes to you and says that he has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	There will always be a place for you to return.
Sam is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Sam.
	We can overcome this with team effort.
Sam is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Sam seems to be interested.
	We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
Sam says he wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots he makes.
	I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.

Sammy
Sammy is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Sammy is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Sammy wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Sammy is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Sammy is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Sammy is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Sammy says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Sammy seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Sammy in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Sammy is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Sammy says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Sammy says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Sammy picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Sammy is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Sammy thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

You come across Sammy, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.
Sammy is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.
Sammy, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	Just playing soccer, that's all.
Sammy says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.
You're having a conversation with Sammy about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I need a Spirit Stone that's as fancy as I am.
Sammy is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!
Let's talk to Sammy who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	I hope it's not a boring place.
Sammy is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	Let's not talk about anything irrelevant to the match.
The teammates are speaking highly of Sammy, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She shows dominance with elegance.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I'm considering making an anonymous donation.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Sammy wants to say a word.
	Get yourselves together, guys. Are you going to give up already?
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	It's sort of an obligation for first class athletes like me to mingle with the community.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	Pathetic. We'll show them that we're better in many ways.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	A square match is what suites a proud royalty.
Sammy points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	It would disgust me if that was the result of an evil plot.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Sammy seems to be surprised.
	It's good to know that they're not shallow people.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Sammy is asking for help.
	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.
Cracsus threatens to hack Sammy's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	I contacted Hildegard.
Sammy is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	It's not good to just believe what others say.
Sammy is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	Don't be scared about such petty things.

Sarah
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Sarah asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Sarah suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!

Saramir
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Saramir asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Saramir suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Saramir is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Pat her on the head.)
Saramir has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Saramir said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Saramir. Saramir seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.

	I am so thankful to them.

	Oh, that'll be so cute!

It's a very intense match and Saramir falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Saramir up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.

	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.

	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.

	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Saramir.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.

	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.

	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.

	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?

	There will always be a place for you to return.

	We can overcome this with team effort.

	I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.

Saunier seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a myth. Forget about it.
With a serious face, Saunier is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.
Saunier came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Let's work up a solution.
Saunier is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They support us from the shadows.
The team is having a good run and Saunier is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
Saunier seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
Saunier seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Saunier is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Flawless skills.
Saunier is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
Saunier plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	We'll see about it after the League.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Saunier and talk about what to do.
	Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.
Saunier seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	I guess he's happy this is a good match.
Saunier's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.
During a match, Saunier bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	We have to keep on going.
Saunier is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
Saunier is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Saunier is starting to get intimidated.
	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

	They were a worthy opponent.

	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.

	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Sena is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I am so thankful to them.
Sena was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Sena asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Sena falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Sena up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Sena having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Sena is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Sena scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Sena.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Sena falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Sena lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give her some heals?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Sena. Let's talk to her.
	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Sena is curious and wants to take a look.
	They must love volunteer work!
Sena brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

Sena is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	The other team went home crying!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Sena comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
You're talking to Sena about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.
Sena is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
	It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
Sena is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
	Make the scouters fall in love with your performance!
Sena isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Sena for solutions.
	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this. 
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Sena and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	There's no time for tears! Find out who did this and bring justice!
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
According to Sena's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	William doesn't know how to respect his seniors.
Sena thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	...Sometimes, the truth is better to be left a secret.
Sena won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	What about soccer? You'll have to go through me to go on that trip!
Sena suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Care to receive the ball with your face?
You're sick and in bed when Sena and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	You guys...I'm about to cry...
The match and the concert that Sena was looking for start at the same time...
	Channel that sorrow and rage towards your opponents and make them pay.
Sena wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Stop right there!
The match started and Sena is standing still doing nothing.
	Run! Just start running!

Serestia
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Serestia asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	What, are you expecting something like ''I feel like I can fly'' or something?
Serestia suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How could you think about eating at a time like this? I'm disappointed in you.
Serestia is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Just nod your head.)
Serestia has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
As Serestia said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.
The crowd is cheering for Serestia. Serestia seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	How about just accepting the compliments for today?
Serestia is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.
Serestia was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!
The team will not have a match for some time. Serestia asks you about your plan.
	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Serestia falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Serestia up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Serestia having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Serestia is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Serestia scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Serestia.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Serestia falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Serestia lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Serestia. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Serestia is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Serestia brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

Serestia seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a myth. Forget about it.
With a serious face, Serestia is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.
Serestia came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Let's work up a solution.
Serestia is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They support us from the shadows.
The team is having a good run and Serestia is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
Serestia seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
Serestia seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Serestia is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Flawless skills.
Serestia is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
Serestia plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	We'll see about it after the League.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Serestia and talk about what to do.
	Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.
Serestia seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	I guess he's happy this is a good match.
Serestia's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.
During a match, Serestia bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	We have to keep on going.
Serestia is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
Serestia is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Serestia is starting to get intimidated.
	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

	The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.

	It would be good to have one of each color, and when they're all grown up...Make 'em into a good meal!
The team will not have a match for some time. Sirius asks you about your plan.
	I have a very hard training session all planned up for everybody.
It's a very intense match and Sirius falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Sirius up and the two exchange smiles.
	Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Sirius having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Sirius is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
Sirius scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Sirius.
	He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Sirius falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Sirius lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	Well, this could all have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Sirius. Let's talk to her.
	(Ignore.)
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Sirius is curious and wants to take a look.
	We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Sirius brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Throw it away. NOW.

Sirius says she's the center of the team and asks if you agree with her. How should we answer?
	Of course! Everybody is counting on you!
Sirius asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give her a sincere answer.
	I want to see everybody smile. I think that'll make me happy.
Sirius is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
	I'd like to keep one as a pet.
Sirius looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to her?
	Where do you think those comets are going?
Sirius says she's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give her an answer.
	Yeah, I mean they could get hurt.
Sirius wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
	I'm planning to make a whole line of merchandise with them as the character.
Sirius is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
	Life is a light of its own.
Sirius says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	Just hear them out and smile. They'll feel better.
Sirius says that Bell seemed depressed when she told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	I sense that there's something she hasn't told us yet...
Sirius seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
	Congratulations! How did you guys get along?
Sirius is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	You're playing soccer! You're fine!
Sirius says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Tell her to be our lap cat.
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Sirius seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you guys keep giving Sirius trouble, I swear to god I'll use you both as special training material.
Sirius is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	She seems like a nice girl.
Sirius went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	Sirius is in danger! We have to save her!
Sirius claims she saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
	She must've made a mistake.
Sirius seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	We can do this! Let's go!
Sirius says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Yeah, they get along pretty well.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Sirius hands you a present.
	(A cute and pretty pendant)
Sirius says that she thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give her an answer.
	I think she likes him.

Skada
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Skada is asking how he did in the match.
	You were picking the other team apart! It was awesome!
Skada looks excited as he's talking with the team about pets. He turns around and asks you what kind of pet you like.
	I like puppies. The loyal ones!
You come across Skada thinking about the value of soccer. What should we tell him?
	I feel something when I overpower my opponents on the field.
Skada is having trouble focusing on the match because of the affectionate emotion he feels. He says he must leave now to propose to his lover. What should we say?
	You don't need to be the one being dragged around.
Skada blushes up and tells you that he's happy he can play soccer with you. What should we tell him?
	*Smiles bitterly*
Skada is asking for special training sessions because he's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell him?
	Sure. Let's get on to it.
Skada did his best, but he failed to achieve the results he wanted and looks sad. We should say something to him.
	Sorry, I feel that this is on me.
Skada is asking you about what you like besides soccer.
	Rugby, a sport of strength!
Skada feels his heart races when he sees Littre.
	...That's not a rabbit.
Kuma is caught sneaking in the woman's locker room once again. We should talk with Skada about what to do with him.
	Let's make him put on Ogre's underwear.
Skada continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Guide him by kicking the ball toward the weak link in the opponent's defense.)
Skada is being annoying with his offensive words. What should we do?
	(Ignore it.)
It's dinner time and Skada is staring at his carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Eat it instead of him.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Skada to do?
	Wake them up. Kick them if you need to.
Skada says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	We shouldn't throw away food. Let's give it to somebody else.
Skada is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop him?
	(Step on the referee's foot and pretend it was an accident.)
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Skada running up ahead.
	(Let him steal your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Skada's shoe.
	(Tell Skada who did this.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Leave it to Skada.)
Skada hurt his leg during the 1st half of the match, but he insists on playing. What should we tell him?
	Okay. You make them pay, understand?

Skada is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	I led our team to victory with wedgies!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Skada comes to you to cheer you up.
	Please explain why you kicked the ball into our goal post, will you?
You're talking to Skada about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell him your answer.
	If it's the end of the world, I'd pull of a crazy performance in a densely populated area before I go!
Skada is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to him.
	Aren't you the one everybody should be afraid of?
Skada is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give him some advice.
	I hope you get scouted by an interesting team.
Skada isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. He feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	Let's invest some Crystals and get new players!
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Skada for solutions.
	How about we put that advanced technology of Metro City to use?
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We could start a reset marathon.
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Skada and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	I could really use some grilled sweet potatoes and chestnuts.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	I think she's something more than just an idol.
According to Skada's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	I want to see Tyler's true characteristics.
Skada thinks he knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	Of course we should tell Lynbell! What are you waiting for?
Skada won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	...World? What about space? Isn't that more interesting?
Skada suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	What's the agenda here? Are you trying to taint the pure angels?
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	I didn't know I was a talented foot volleyball player!
You're sick and in bed when Skada and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	Get closer so I can spread my germs!
The match and the concert that Skada was looking for start at the same time...
	Let's hack the big screen so we can see the concert!
Skada wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	The character story left him a trauma.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	...Maybe he just likes cats!
The match started and Skada is standing still doing nothing.
	What is he doing? Is he a totem?

Skorn
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Skorn is asking how he did in the match.
	You bring the best out of the team. Good work!

	I think that a baby duck following its mother is one of the most adorable things to watch.

	The field is a ground of hopes and dreams. Isn't that enough?

	...Do you want a Superb Power-up?

	I'm not sure if it's safe, but we can use him for leveling up.

	(Make a strategic decision.)

	They all need scolding.

	Let's stay away from the soup, just in case.

Skorn hurt his leg during the 1st half of the match, but he insists on playing. What should we tell him?
	Don't push yourself too hard. There are a lot of matches left.

	I'm going to make a joke before I start crying!

	Do you think they'll be tasty?
Skorn looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to him?
	Do you think any of those comets are populated?

	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Skorn wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give him an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Skorn is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to him.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.

	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.
Skorn says that Bell seemed depressed when he told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.

	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!

	Please don't forget about the match.

	Is her name really Kiki?

	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?

	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Skorn went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of him when he comes back.

	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?

	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?

	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.

	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)

	Maybe she's up to something.

Sky
Sky is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	The other team went home crying!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Sky comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
You're talking to Sky about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.
Sky is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
	It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
Sky is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
	Make the scouters fall in love with your performance!
Sky isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Sky for solutions.
	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this. 
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Sky and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	There's no time for tears! Find out who did this and bring justice!
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
According to Sky's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	William doesn't know how to respect his seniors.
Sky thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	...Sometimes, the truth is better to be left a secret.
Sky won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	What about soccer? You'll have to go through me to go on that trip!
Sky suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Care to receive the ball with your face?
You're sick and in bed when Sky and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	You guys...I'm about to cry...
The match and the concert that Sky was looking for start at the same time...
	Channel that sorrow and rage towards your opponents and make them pay.
Sky wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Stop right there!
The match started and Sky is standing still doing nothing.
	Run! Just start running!

You find Sky depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Sky is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Sky being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Sky is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Sky is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Sky is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Sky seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Sky who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Sky and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Sky looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Sky's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Sky seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Sky.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Sky and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Sky do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Sky. What should you say?
	Well, Sky does have that kind of charm.
Sky is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Sky after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Sophie asks what your plans are for the holidays when there's no training or match. Give her an answer.
	(Meet up with my lover.)
Sophie heard stories about the world of the demons and asks what you think it'll be like.
	It'll sure be dangerous, but I think it'll be a place full of thrills and wonders.
Sophie, who seems to be interested in Eve, is asking your opinion about her. What should we tell her?
	Maybe she would be too much for you.
Recently, Sophie seems to enjoy chatting with Jin. She thinks Jin is funny. Let's talk with her.
	I didn't know you were into old men.
Sophie is thinking about how to resist the psychological and mental attacks that the demons enjoy using. Let's give her advice.
	How about you just go with the flow?
Sophie is worried about Vermilion Bird. She thinks something is troubling Vermilion Bird.
	Didn't she grow up being friends with the princess? I think I know what's going on...
Sophie's uniform is all messed up because of the filthy plays of her opponent. What should we do?
	(It won't be long until the opponent becomes mesmerized by Sophie's charms.)
A defender on the other team seems to have fallen in love with Sophie and is chasing her around the field. It looks like the player forgot about the match. What should we do?
	Nobody can resist that charm of yours.
Kaidormu of the United Explorers is praising Sophie's plays. Let's add in.
	Yeah, she's as charming as you!
The team became furious after seeing Sophie fall by the focused attack of the opposing team and used that fury to win the game. Let's say something.
	Your beauty is a curse...
Sophie is having trouble finding a Spirit Stone that fits her needs and taste. Let's give her advice.
	How about Metatron's Will? It's cute with the butterfly decorations.
Sophie is asking about the whereabouts of a teammate that hasn't seen for quite a while. Let's give her an answer.
	I used him as training material so that he could be useful to you.
Sophie is planning to go on a blind date with a close teammate. Should we say something to her?
	Don't get greedy and go for all of the men.
It seems that Sophie is wondering what to do after a teammate proposed to her. It doesn't seem that she's not entirely uninterested. What should we do?
	Just make sure that it doesn't affect him on the field.
Sophie is teasing her opponent that is having a hard time chasing her. What should we do?
	Well, that player is kind of cute...

Sorrow
Sorrow is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Sorrow is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Sorrow wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Sorrow is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Sorrow is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Sorrow is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Sorrow says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Sorrow seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Sorrow in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Sorrow is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Sorrow says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Sorrow says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Sorrow picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Sorrow is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Sorrow thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Sorrow is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
	We need a decent level of personal performance.
Sorrow, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Sorrow announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Sorrow is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Sorrow wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Sorrow is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Sorrow? Nah, she never gets lost.
You find Sorrow lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Sorrow says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Sorrow wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Sorrow caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Sorrow some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Sorrow seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Sorrow came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Sorrow is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Sorrow seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Sorrow looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Sorrow to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Stella
Stella is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	To win all the way, of course.
Stella is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
	I'm all about the feeling. A spark is all it takes.
Stella seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
	(Stick a thumb up and do a comedic dance just for the sake of laughter.)
Stella is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
	You're right. This is a waste of time.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
	I don't see anything wrong as long as you can get away with it.
Stella is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
	Cool! Keep it up!
Stella is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
	It's silly of you to worry about such things. Are you feeling okay?
Stella is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
	The door's over there.
Stella is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
	It can't be perfect every time.
Stella is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?
	How about we play baseball today?
It's before the 2nd half, and Stella is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
	There's nothing we can really do. Let's just get this over with.
You forgot to lock Stella and almost used her as training material! She looks very upset!
	It's your fault.
Stella is confused that she won the MVP. What should you tell her?
	Nicely done! We're throwing a party today!
Stella is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
	Something full of excitement!
The team is saying bad things about Stella for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
	Her love towards soccer is real.
Stella is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
	I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
Stella seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to her. 
	It'll be alright. Don't worry.
On a day off, Stella is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
Stella is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Stella asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Stella suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Stella is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Stella has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Stella said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Stella. Stella seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Stella is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Stella was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Stella asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Stella falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Stella up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Stella having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Stella is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	The fans love your performance!
Stella scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Stella.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Stella falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Stella lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Stella. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Stella is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Stella brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Sue

Sunny
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Sunny asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Sunny suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.
Sunny is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
	(Pat her on the head.)
Sunny has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Sunny said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.

	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.

	I am so thankful to them.
Sunny was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Sunny asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Sunny falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Sunny up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Sunny having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Sunny is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Sunny scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Sunny.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Sunny falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Sunny lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?

Susie

	It's a result of team effort.

	I was just thinking about how much you do for the team.

	I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.

	Here! I made some cookies with the team.

The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
	I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.

	Sorry for the bad news. Do you want to pay a visit?
Susie comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
	There will always be a place for you to return.

	We can overcome this with team effort.

	I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.

	We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.

	They must love volunteer work!

	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

	Hey! The match is over!

	Don't come over here! It's dangerous!

	Don't you think about sneaking her out. She's our pretty girl.

	I'm proud that you played your game and didn't descend to the opponent's level.

	If you're better than your teammates, you should be the one to be considerate.

	Just playing soccer, that's all.

	I'm starting to enjoy playing with you.

	Let's do this! I'm at your disposal!

	I hope it's not a boring place.

	I'm going to pick sides of the one I like.

	It's not good to just believe what others say.

	Don't be scared about such petty things.
