	(Pat him on the head.)
Timmy has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
As Timmy said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
The crowd is cheering for Timmy. Timmy seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
Timmy is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I am so thankful to them.
Timmy was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. Timmy asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and Timmy falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Timmy up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Timmy having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
Timmy is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Timmy scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Timmy.
	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
Timmy falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Timmy lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	This doesn't look good...Can anybody give him some heals?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Timmy. Let's talk to her.
	Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Timmy is curious and wants to take a look.
	They must love volunteer work!
Timmy brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

Timmy is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to him.
	Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
Timmy is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help him?
	It's the place of dreams colliding.
Timmy wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
	Why don't you join them and find out?
Timmy is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became his life. Let's talk with him.
	Yeah, I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Timmy is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give him an opinion.
	Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
Timmy is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
	My fans!
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
	Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
Timmy says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
	He'll remember someday.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
	Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Timmy seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
	I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
Ogre's pony tail slapped Timmy in the face!
	That must hurt.
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
	Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Timmy is suddenly showing massive improvement in his performance. He must've learned something during a match.
	Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
Timmy says that the Swirlies are missing.
	They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
Timmy says he forgot to use his skill points before entering the match. What should we say to him?
	Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
	...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Timmy picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
	Oh, I'm sure going to read this! That's a joke, of course...
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
	A crow?!
Timmy is irritated because his opponent has the attribute advantage over him.
	It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Timmy thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
	Isn't that the same with all other beastmen?

Tina
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Tina is asking how she did in the match.
	You bring the best out of the team. Good work!
Tina looks excited as she's talking with the team about pets. She turns around and asks you what kind of pet you like.
	I think that a baby duck following its mother is one of the most adorable things to watch.
You come across Tina thinking about the value of soccer. What should we tell her?
	The field is a ground of hopes and dreams. Isn't that enough?
Tina is having trouble focusing on the match because of the affectionate emotion she feels. She says she must leave now to propose to her lover. What should we say?
	Think about your teammates that are counting on you.
Tina blushes up and tells you that she's happy she can play soccer with you. What should we tell her?
	Me too. You're a good leader.
Tina is asking for special training sessions because she's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell her?
	If that's your wish.
Tina did her best, but she failed to achieve the results she wanted and looks sad. We should say something to her.
	It's experiences like this that bonds us together.
Tina is asking you about what you like besides soccer.
	I like board games about war. I admire famous commanders.
Tina feels her heart races when she sees Littre.
	...Do you want a Superb Power-up?
Kuma is caught sneaking in the woman's locker room once again. We should talk with Tina about what to do with him.
	I'm not sure if it's safe, but we can use him for leveling up.
Tina continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Make a strategic decision.)
Tina is being annoying with her offensive words. What should we do?
	(Kick her out of the team if things can't be handled.)
It's dinner time and Tina is staring at her carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Tell her that carrots are good for the body and to eat it all.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Tina to do?
	They all need scolding.
Tina says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	Let's stay away from the soup, just in case.
Tina is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop her?
	Ignore the referee. Focus on the match.
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Tina running up ahead.
	(Catch up and share your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Tina's shoe.
	(Remove the tack and tell the manager on the other team.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Wake the player up and continue with the meeting.)
Tina hurt her leg during the 1st half of the match, but she insists on playing. What should we tell her?
	Don't push yourself too hard. There are a lot of matches left.

You find Tina depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	It's not your fault that you fell during the match. Don't worry about it!
Tina is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be all negative because there were some mistakes. You're a precious part of this team.
You come across Tina being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Don't use that ability on the field...
Tina is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	Stay by my side and make sure I don't make any mistakes, will you?
Tina is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	I'll sleep by your side tonight.
Tina is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	It's not your fault. It's your mistakes that took the opponents off guard.
Tina seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	Perfect! No mistakes made!
You come across Tina who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	I think I'll get injured too if you're on the field. Please sit on the bench.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Ramen, that's a dangerous food to cook.
You're watching the storm with Tina and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	She shines even in the darkest storms! How gorgeous!
Tina looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Did you prepare your meds in case you get space-sick? Never mind, I'll prepare the meds.
Tina's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Tina seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	I think that player likes you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Tina.
	You saved us all from that awkward moment by tripping on your own foot.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Kuma alert! Get back to the shelter!
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Tina and her opponent isn't over yet.
	Hey! The match is over!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Tina do?
	(Let her clean, but warn her not to cause any trouble.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	Well, you did get ''dirty'' by falling in the dirt.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Tina. What should you say?
	Well, you're as cute as Tina.
Tina is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Don't come over here! It's dangerous!
Latios is chatting with Tina after the match. Let's barge in.
	Don't you think about sneaking her out. She's our pretty girl.

Tod
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Tod asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Tod suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Tod is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Tod has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Tod said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Tod. Tod seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Tod is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Tod was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Tod asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Tod falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Tod up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Tod having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Tod is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	The fans love your performance!
Tod scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Tod.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Tod falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Tod lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Tod. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Tod is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Tod brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Tod seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a myth. Forget about it.
With a serious face, Tod is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
	Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.
Tod came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	Let's work up a solution.
Tod is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
	They support us from the shadows.
The team is having a good run and Tod is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
Tod seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
Tod seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
	Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Tod is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
	Flawless skills.
Tod is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
Tod plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
	We'll see about it after the League.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Tod and talk about what to do.
	Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.
Tod seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
	I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	I guess he's happy this is a good match.
Tod's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
	If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.
During a match, Tod bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
	We have to keep on going.
Tod is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
	Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
Tod is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Tod is starting to get intimidated.
	This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.

Tria

	We need a decent level of personal performance.

	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Tria announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Tria is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Tria wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Tria is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Tria? Nah, she never gets lost.
You find Tria lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Tria says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Tria wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Tria caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Tria some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Tria seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Tria came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Tria is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Tria seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Tria looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Tria to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Valentine, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
	I've never dreamt about soccer.
Valentine announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	I have faith in you.
Valentine is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	That doesn't change what we must do.
Valentine wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It seems that Valentine is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Valentine? Nah, he never gets lost.
You find Valentine lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Valentine says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Valentine wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
	That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
Valentine caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Valentine some orders.
	Let's try out some forward passes.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	It's time we use him as training material.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Valentine seems to be worried.
	It's unfortunate, but that's something that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Valentine came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
	I hope that wasn't all you got.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...We should get out of here.
Valentine is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
	It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Valentine seems to be sick of this.
	Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Valentine looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
	It's space. Anything can exist here.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Valentine to set some simple rules.
	Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.

Valkia
Valkia is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	They were a worthy opponent.
This was the worst game in your entire life...Valkia comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks. You always know how to get me back on my feet.
You're talking to Valkia about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
	I would say goodbye to all my friends.
Valkia is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
	I'm sure everybody is feeling the same way you feel.
Valkia is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
	Let's make that our goal and make it happen.
Valkia isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	Let's all talk together and figure out what the problem is.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Valkia for solutions.
	I guess it's time the benchwarmers get a chance.
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	Let's ask for help to the League officials on this planet.
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Valkia and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	Let's give her some space.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	This proves that even the aliens like Nari.
According to Valkia's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	I thought they were just friends.
Valkia thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	First, let's look for a way to bring him back to normal. 
Valkia won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	Hmm, come back to me with a vacation plan.
Valkia suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	That would be wonderful! I'll go ask for permission.
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Let's see what you have to say after the match.
You're sick and in bed when Valkia and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	I'm sorry...I should be giving you guys some tea or something, but...
The match and the concert that Valkia was looking for start at the same time...
	I'm sorry that you couldn't go.
Valkia wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Long ago, he was disgraceful towards a dragon emissary.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Excuse me, but do you have an appointment with that cat?
The match started and Valkia is standing still doing nothing.
	Looks like we'll have to do without her.

You find Valkia depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Valkia is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Valkia being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Are you feeling alright?
Valkia is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Valkia is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Valkia is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	You can overcome this like always. Right?
Valkia seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.
You come across Valkia who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Don't push yourself too hard. Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
You're watching the storm with Valkia and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	What's wrong with her?
Valkia looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Littre will be fine.
Valkia's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Valkia seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	That player is just messing with you.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Valkia.
	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Valkia and her opponent isn't over yet.
	You better win that fight!
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Valkia do?
	(Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	They will never learn with an attitude like that.
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Valkia. What should you say?
	Well, Valkia does have that kind of charm.
Valkia is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Valkia after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Valkyrja Beth
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Valkyrja Beth is asking how she did in the match.
	You bring the best out of the team. Good work!
Valkyrja Beth looks excited as she's talking with the team about pets. She turns around and asks you what kind of pet you like.
	I think that a baby duck following its mother is one of the most adorable things to watch.
You come across Valkyrja Beth thinking about the value of soccer. What should we tell her?
	The field is a ground of hopes and dreams. Isn't that enough?
Valkyrja Beth is having trouble focusing on the match because of the affectionate emotion she feels. She says she must leave now to propose to her lover. What should we say?
	Think about your teammates that are counting on you.
Valkyrja Beth blushes up and tells you that she's happy she can play soccer with you. What should we tell her?
	Me too. You're a good leader.
Valkyrja Beth is asking for special training sessions because she's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell her?
	If that's your wish.
Valkyrja Beth did her best, but she failed to achieve the results she wanted and looks sad. We should say something to her.
	It's experiences like this that bonds us together.
Valkyrja Beth is asking you about what you like besides soccer.
	I like board games about war. I admire famous commanders.
Valkyrja Beth feels her heart races when she sees Littre.
	...Do you want a Superb Power-up?
Kuma is caught sneaking in the woman's locker room once again. We should talk with Valkyrja Beth about what to do with him.
	I'm not sure if it's safe, but we can use him for leveling up.
Valkyrja Beth continues to charge into the opponent's defense line and keeps failing. What should we do?
	(Make a strategic decision.)
Valkyrja Beth is being annoying with her offensive words. What should we do?
	(Kick her out of the team if things can't be handled.)
It's dinner time and Valkyrja Beth is staring at her carrot soup with a troubled look. What should we do?
	(Tell her that carrots are good for the body and to eat it all.)
It's early in the morning and there are players that are having trouble waking up for the morning training. What should we tell Valkyrja Beth to do?
	They all need scolding.
Valkyrja Beth says that the soup tastes funny. What should we do?
	Let's stay away from the soup, just in case.
Valkyrja Beth is furious about the referee that's clearly favoring the other team. Should we stop her?
	Ignore the referee. Focus on the match.
It suddenly began to rain heavily. You see Valkyrja Beth running up ahead.
	(Catch up and share your umbrella.)
You witnessed a player on the other side putting a tack in Valkyrja Beth's shoe.
	(Remove the tack and tell the manager on the other team.)
During the team meeting, you find a player sleeping. What should you do?
	(Wake the player up and continue with the meeting.)
Valkyrja Beth hurt her leg during the 1st half of the match, but she insists on playing. What should we tell her?
	Don't push yourself too hard. There are a lot of matches left.

You come across Valkyrja Beth, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
	Those scumbags played dirty. Ugh, I'm angry!
Valkyrja Beth is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
	I'm not comfortable with this conversation.
Valkyrja Beth, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?
	To bring justice with soccer. That's all.
Valkyrja Beth says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give her an answer.
	Let's do our best until the very end!
You're having a conversation with Valkyrja Beth about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
	I won't rely on Spirit Stones.
Valkyrja Beth is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
	I like what you just said.
Let's talk to Valkyrja Beth who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
	It's a place to rest for the good.
Valkyrja Beth is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.
	It's something I'd want to see again with a person I care.
The teammates are speaking highly of Valkyrja Beth, saying she's a good role model. Let's add in.
	She's truly a role model to us all with her skills and attitude.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
	I feel sorry, but that's irrelevant to the match.
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Valkyrja Beth wants to say a word.
	Come on guys, you know it's an exciting thing to be playing against a strong team! Keep your heads up high!
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
	So, there are no real illegal matches. I guess I'm relieved.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?
	We will confront them fair and square, and win.
The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
	Would she be happy if she finds out you're doing this?
Valkyrja Beth points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
	That's too convenient to be a coincidence.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Valkyrja Beth seems to be surprised.
	Well, what do you know! They have some decency in them after all.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Valkyrja Beth is asking for help.
	I hope the demon didn't say anything stupid.
Cracsus threatens to hack Valkyrja Beth's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
	Don't fall for this cheap shot.
Valkyrja Beth is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
	Then we should do our very best to win.
Valkyrja Beth is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
	I don't like the word oblivion.

	Her love towards soccer is real.

	It'll be alright. Don't worry.

	If you find a handsome man, try talking to him!
Verister is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
	(I want every day to be exciting and fun.)

	It's finally time for some festival-soccer!

Verister asks what you think is the most important ability in soccer. Give her an answer.
	Excitement and elegance. The fans love it.

	I think they're also mesmerized by you. You have a charm that matches a demon...

	Yeah. The sight of you running on the field was marvelous.
Verister is asking what it would be like to date an alien. Give her your opinion.
	I believe it'll be romantic.
Verister seems to be planning to enter for the Galaxy League Mascot Contest. Let's talk to her.
	Mascot? More like a super model. You're too good looking to be a mere mascot.
Verister asks what your plans are for the holidays when there's no training or match. Give her an answer.
	(Meet up with my lover.)
Verister heard stories about the world of the demons and asks what you think it'll be like.
	It'll sure be dangerous, but I think it'll be a place full of thrills and wonders.
Verister, who seems to be interested in Eve, is asking your opinion about her. What should we tell her?
	Maybe she would be too much for you.
Recently, Verister seems to enjoy chatting with Jin. She thinks Jin is funny. Let's talk with her.
	I didn't know you were into old men.
Verister is thinking about how to resist the psychological and mental attacks that the demons enjoy using. Let's give her advice.
	How about you just go with the flow?
Verister is worried about Vermilion Bird. She thinks something is troubling Vermilion Bird.
	Didn't she grow up being friends with the princess? I think I know what's going on...
Verister's uniform is all messed up because of the filthy plays of her opponent. What should we do?
	(It won't be long until the opponent becomes mesmerized by Verister's charms.)
A defender on the other team seems to have fallen in love with Verister and is chasing her around the field. It looks like the player forgot about the match. What should we do?
	Nobody can resist that charm of yours.
Kaidormu of the United Explorers is praising Verister's plays. Let's add in.
	Yeah, she's as charming as you!
The team became furious after seeing Verister fall by the focused attack of the opposing team and used that fury to win the game. Let's say something.
	Your beauty is a curse...
Verister is having trouble finding a Spirit Stone that fits her needs and taste. Let's give her advice.
	How about Metatron's Will? It's cute with the butterfly decorations.
Verister is asking about the whereabouts of a teammate that hasn't seen for quite a while. Let's give her an answer.
	I used him as training material so that he could be useful to you.
Verister is planning to go on a blind date with a close teammate. Should we say something to her?
	Don't get greedy and go for all of the men.
It seems that Verister is wondering what to do after a teammate proposed to her. It doesn't seem that she's not entirely uninterested. What should we do?
	Just make sure that it doesn't affect him on the field.
Verister is teasing her opponent that is having a hard time chasing her. What should we do?
	Well, that player is kind of cute...

Vermilion Bird
You find Vermilion Bird depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
	You did well and I thank you for that.
Vermilion Bird is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	That's why I need your help.
You come across Vermilion Bird being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
	Are you feeling alright?
Vermilion Bird is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
	I was always looking forward for that moment.
Vermilion Bird is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
	It's just a dream. Forget about it.

	You can overcome this like always. Right?

	I'm starting to see true strength in this team.

	Can't you cook ramen by yourself?

	What's wrong with her?

	Littre will be fine.

	That player is just messing with you.

	Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's give them a hand.

	You better win that fight!

	(Let him take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.)

	They will never learn with an attitude like that.

	Well, Vermilion Bird does have that kind of charm.

	Can you peel this guy off of me?
Latios is chatting with Vermilion Bird after the match. Let's barge in.
	I'm looking forward to our next match!

Vermilion Bird seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
	Game results aren't that simple to be predicted by fortune-telling.
With a serious face, Vermilion Bird is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
	Being together is enough for me.
Vermilion Bird came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
	I'm disappointed, too. Let's start over.
Vermilion Bird is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
	Even if they're not on the field with us, we're fighting as one. Right?
The team is having a good run and Vermilion Bird is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	Let's keep this momentum going!
Vermilion Bird seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Vermilion Bird seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
	Don't be weak.
Vermilion Bird is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
	Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Vermilion Bird is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Vermilion Bird plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
	I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Vermilion Bird and talk about what to do.
	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
Vermilion Bird seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great. 
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	...Uh...So no soccer?
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Vermilion Bird's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
	Remember that feeling and use it when things get tough.

	It's something that happened during the match. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Vermilion Bird is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
	It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.

	I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.

	I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Vermilion Bird is starting to get intimidated.
	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

Victoria
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Victoria asks how you feel. How should we answer?

	Save the energy for the match.

	The fans love your performance!

	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!

	I feel like he's mocking us!

	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Victoria lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Victoria. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Victoria is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Victoria brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

	What could it be? Money? Luck? Weather? Hmm? What?

	I've been chased by a soccer ball monster in my dreams. It was terrifying.

	You'll have to compete with me!

	Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.

	It'll be pretty exciting if we could stay the same even after 10 years.

	Listen carefully and you'll find her.

	Stop wandering around the kids snack corner!

	I'll tackle him down! Knock his lights out!

	What about just watching?

	You came to see my marvelous moves? I'm flattered.

	Stop right there, pig!

	How about we ask Jeunese?

	Come on, I'll show you the best spots around!

	It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.

	I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.

	I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.

	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

White Snow is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
	Don't be anxious. Have faith and keep following me.
You come across White Snow being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
	Don't worry, I'll go with you.
White Snow is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
	I'm afraid to be honest.
White Snow is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
	I see. We must be careful. I'll be watching over you.
White Snow is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
	Let's solve the problems one by one.
White Snow seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
	It's thanks to you! Thanks for listening to my instructions!
You come across White Snow who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
	Trust me and your teammates. Sit this one out.
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
	Is Marilyn your mother or nanny?
You're watching the storm with White Snow and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
	Is something troubling her? I'm having a bad feeling.
White Snow looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
	Don't worry. Leave it up to me.
White Snow's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. White Snow seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
	You're doing fine. Don't play your opponent's game.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw White Snow.
	I think he felt better because of the positive energy you always have around you.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
	Let's ignore them and get ready for the match.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between White Snow and her opponent isn't over yet.
	I've never seen her worked up that much.
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have White Snow do?
	(Give her instructions so that she can do her share of the cleaning quickly.)
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
	We didn't play dirty, right?
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting White Snow. What should you say?
	I hope you two become good rivals.
White Snow is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
	Don't worry about me! Do your job!
Latios is chatting with White Snow after the match. Let's barge in.
	White Snow was fantastic on the field, right?

White Tiger
White Tiger is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
	Teamwork is what matters the most.

	Vicious? More like ugly.

	Passes that you prefer aren't always the right answer.

	It was all just to motivate you to become a better player!

	Aren't you satisfied with your performance?

	I would've tried to find something that fits me.

	Skipping practice isn't something that's in her dictionary.

	Hmm...If only I could change the shape of the horns and the color of the scales. That'd be perfect.

	Everybody should grow up.

	It's really hard to find the right person.

	(I want my dreams to come true.)

	What's done is done. Let's come up with a new design.

	Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
White Tiger suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	How about we go eat salad? I'm on a diet.

	(Pat her on the head.)
White Tiger has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
	I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.

	I'm sure it's going in a good direction.

	They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
White Tiger is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
	I am so thankful to them.
White Tiger was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
	Oh, that'll be so cute!
The team will not have a match for some time. White Tiger asks you about your plan.
	Hmm, wanna go shopping?
It's a very intense match and White Tiger falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps White Tiger up and the two exchange smiles.
	That player must have a heart of gold.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across White Tiger having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?

	Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.

	Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?

	It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.

	Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.

	They must love volunteer work!

	The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...

William

	Being together is enough for me.

	Let's keep this momentum going!

	Let's open up a bright future with this ball.

	Don't be weak.

	I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.

	We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.

	I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great.

	...Uh...So no soccer?

	The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!

	Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.

Xiao Lang is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
	They're on cooldown.
The team is having a good run and Xiao Lang is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
	As long as we're not used as training material...
Xiao Lang seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
	Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Xiao Lang seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
	Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Xiao Lang is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
	Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Xiao Lang is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
	Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Xiao Lang plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
	I'm thinking of opening a shop.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Xiao Lang and talk about what to do.
	I hope they have a ''Continue'' button around here.
Xiao Lang seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
	Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
	Cool! Awesome!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
	Has he gone mad?
Xiao Lang's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
	Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
During a match, Xiao Lang bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
	Wasn't that a glitch?
Xiao Lang is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
	I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
	Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Xiao Lang is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
	I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Xiao Lang is starting to get intimidated.
	He's obviously obsessed with soccer.

Xiao Long
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Xiao Long asks how you feel. How should we answer?
	This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Xiao Long suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
	Good idea. Let's go eat some meat!
Xiao Long is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
	(Put your thumbs up, wink, and send a juicy smile.)
Xiao Long has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
	Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
As Xiao Long said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
	It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
The crowd is cheering for Xiao Long. Xiao Long seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
	They're all in love with your enthusiastic play.
Xiao Long is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
	I feel like the whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
Xiao Long was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
	We can play soccer with the penguins!
The team will not have a match for some time. Xiao Long asks you about your plan.
	We could ask one of the top teams for a friendly match.
It's a very intense match and Xiao Long falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Xiao Long up and the two exchange smiles.
	True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
	It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Xiao Long having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
	Save the energy for the match.
Xiao Long is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
	The fans love your performance!
Xiao Long scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
	You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Xiao Long.
	I feel like he's mocking us!
Xiao Long falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
	Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Xiao Long lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
	I will avenge you!
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Xiao Long. Let's talk to her.
	We'll win next time!
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Xiao Long is curious and wants to take a look.
	Let's go help them!
Xiao Long brought a drink that he says he received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
	Drink it up!

Xiao Long is looking excited and asks how the match went.
	The other team went home crying!
This was the worst game in your entire life...Xiao Long comes to you to cheer you up.
	Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
You're talking to Xiao Long about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell him your answer.
	Hmm, there's a guy I'd like to beat up before I die.
Xiao Long is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to him.
	It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
Xiao Long is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give him some advice.
	Make the scouters fall in love with your performance!
Xiao Long isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. He feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
	We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Xiao Long for solutions.
	We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this. 
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
	We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Xiao Long and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest. 
	There's no time for tears! Find out who did this and bring justice!
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
	The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
According to Xiao Long's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
	William doesn't know how to respect his seniors.
Xiao Long thinks he knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
	...Sometimes, the truth is better to be left a secret.
Xiao Long won a trip around the world from a radio event!
	What about soccer? You'll have to go through me to go on that trip!
Xiao Long suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
	This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
	Care to receive the ball with your face?
You're sick and in bed when Xiao Long and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
	You guys...I'm about to cry...
The match and the concert that Xiao Long was looking for start at the same time...
	Channel that sorrow and rage towards your opponents and make them pay.
Xiao Long wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
	Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
	Stop right there!
The match started and Xiao Long is standing still doing nothing.
	Run! Just start running!

	Teach them how adults play soccer.
Zibroi wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give him an answer.
	Beginner level monsters in an RPG game.
Zibroi is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to him.
	That's deep. I think it's cool.
Zibroi says he was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
	You can point out their mistakes and flaws but still keep things humorous. Just don't go too sarcastic on them.

	It'll be better if you don't show her that you're sorry.
Zibroi seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell him?
	Don't forget that we exist! Haha!
Zibroi is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
	Please don't forget about the match.
Zibroi says he's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
	Is her name really Kiki?
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Zibroi seems to be troubled. What should we do?
	If you had to choose one of the two, which would it be?
Zibroi is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle. 
	It's nice to see two people of different class have a delightful chat.
Zibroi went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
	We should think about how to make fun of him when he comes back.

	Maybe Sophie is actually a male...?
Zibroi seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
	Don't be nervous! Don't you trust your teammates?
Zibroi says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
	Well, I'm better than him because I'm in love with this team.

	(A surprise box! Inside it there's a cool wallet.)
Zibroi says that he thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give him an answer.
	Maybe she's up to something.

Zibroi is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
	What could it be? Money? Luck? Weather? Hmm? What?

	I've been chased by a soccer ball monster in my dreams. It was terrifying.
Zibroi announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
	You'll have to compete with me!
Zibroi is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
	Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.
Zibroi wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
	It'll be pretty exciting if we could stay the same even after 10 years.
It seems that Zibroi is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
	Listen carefully and you'll find him.
You find Zibroi lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
	Stop wandering around the kids snack corner!
Zibroi says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
	Hmm? That is odd...What do you think about this?
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
	I'll tackle him down! Knock his lights out!

	What about just watching?
Zibroi caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
	You came to see my marvelous moves? I'm flattered. 
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Zibroi some orders.
	Pass? Shoot? Forfeit? Argh! Just make a run for it!
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
	Stop right there, pig!

	Let's just go. That player will also feel uncomfortable if we keep standing here.

	What happened to you? Do you want me to lend you some money?
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
	...It's about to go down...! Where's the popcorn?

	Who could've done such a hideous thing?

	Okay! Now I'll tell you all the good stuff about Zibroi!

	How about we ask Jeunese?
